string.text: I greet you brother! Glory to the Monolith!
And to you regards! Is there any work for me?

Brother our Director is waiting for you. He will tell you about our rules and commandments. Listen to him and take everything in. Here, take these specially prepared items: weapons and equipment. God and the power of the Monolith are with you!
Thanks brother I'm going.
Teacher I need something repaired.
Yes our enemies are not asleep, let's have a look.
Repair the first gun.
Repair the second gun.
Repair the armour.
Teacher I don't have enough money.
Here is your weapon brother, let our enemies tremble.
Armour repaired. Glory to Monolith! Down with our evil enemies, one additional brother is ready to defend our truth.
I thank you, Teacher.
I am again ready to bear faith and truth to the un-believers. Glory to the Monolith!
Teacher there's more.
Oh that's cool, let's take a look.
How do you do Teacher?
I salute you brother! I'm glad you have joined us recently, therefore I wish to give to you several manuals.
You have my full attention, Teacher.

As anyone who has embarked on the true path, you must work. The killing of infidels - is the responsibility of all our members. But nevertheless, the community must survive. We need, food, water, med kits, ammo and so on. To get all of this, we require artifacts. The outside World, alas, is not with us, there is only chaos and disbelief. They're ready to sell anything to anyone, but what they mostly require, is what the Zone produces - artifacts. Each member of community is obligated to yield any artifacts, which he finds. For them, he will receive rations, consisting of rounds of ammunition, food and med kits. The better the artefact, the better the rations.
I greet you Teacher.
Go on brother I'm listening.
I understand Teacher I will try.
Teacher, I brought something here, look.
Artifacts?
I have a Stone Flower.
I have a Stone Blood.
I have a Night Star.
I have a Soul.
I have a Spring.
I have a Crystal.
I have a Goldfish.
I have a Meat Chunk.
I have a Gravi.
Oh excuse me Teacher I was wrong.
Not much ... Well, here's three packs of ammo for the AK, a med kit and one antirad.
Slim pickings, well okay, take two regular med kits.

Oh-oh-oh, A Night Star! Let me look at it ... ya don't see them around here very often. Good for you, here's somne ammo: 5 packs of armour piercing rounds for the ThunderStorm, two scientific med kits and two antirads.
Rare artefact, you deserve a reward! Here, NATO cartridges, 5 packs, plus 3 scientific med kits.
It has been a long time since anyone has brought me a Spring. Here, for your SVU, are 5 packs of armour-piercing bullets and 2 antirads.
You have brought the Crystal? I'm pleased! Take 5 packs of standard cartridges for the Val, and two army med kits.
For the Goldfish take this: Five packs of armour-piercing cartridges for the AK, two army med kits and five cans of food.
For the Meat Chunk, I will give you 3 boxes of ammo for the AK, a standard med kit and 4 pieces of sausage.
For the Gravi here are 3 packs of normal NATO rounds, 2 standard med kits and 4 pieces of sausage.
Glory to the Monolith!

Glory to the Monolith! I greet our new brother! As you already know, we recently gained control over the territory of the Sarcophagus. After the accident here, besides us, there was not a single person, only monsters. Too many of them are spread through-out. Here's the first task: beneath us, in the Sarcophagus, we have got a family of 5-6 Burers around. We don't want them here. Therefore, soldier, listen to the order: Go there and clear out the area. These creatures have stolen a device - a decoder, which we really need. It is necessary that we annihilate these dwarfs, and recover the decoder. Dig up all their holes, but find the instrument.
I am happy to fulfil this mission Director. I will not fail you.
I greet you Director!
Oh our new brother have you fulfilled my task?
Yes I did as you requested. The Dwarfs are annihilated and here is your instrument.
Brother!
What is it?
Do you have anything to drink?
Brother are you mad? They can hear us.
I must have some, It's been more than three months since I've had a drink ... I can't take it any longer. Get me five bottles of Vodka my friend, and I'll give you a brand new gun, a TT-33.
I'm sorry brother but I have no vodka.
Here take it, but make sure Mahon does not see you...
Brother do you have any excess food?
Need anything?
I need five cans of preserved food to eat whilst hunting, but Mahon won't give me any.
Okay if I find some I'll bring it to you.
Hello!
And hello to you, here, I have found exactly 5 cans.
Brother I thank you, but I have nothing to give. Listen, I have here a recipe for transmutations. I'll download it to your PDA. It will be useful.
Thanks for the recipe. Good luck, brother. Glory to the Monolith!
Brother, do you have batteries for a PDA?
Of course not, where would I get them?
Well there is no shop around here, of course, but there is a way. Bring me 5 PDA's. All I really want are the batteries.
It is agreeable brother, if I find 5 PDA's then I will bring them to you.
Hey brother did you get them?
Yes, here take them!
Thank you! Wait, I can't thank you enough. I've got a Koster grenade launcher, quite new, and some ammo for the AK, here, take them.
Did you summon me, Charon?
Yes, brother, I have a task for you.
I'm listening, Director.

Solomon's group have spotted a few stalkers in Chernobyl-2. It turns out that our enemy has infiltrated our rear. These 'infidels' not only do not wish to embark on the true course, they defile the 'Holy Places' with their presence.
Give me permission; I'll erase them into powder. These infidels will receive their just deserts!

Do not hurry, and do not go alone. Solomon's Group is waiting for you, find them. Remember, I need Solomon alive. You are responsible for his head! Here's a little ammo and a couple of med kits. Transition on CNPP-2 you will find in the room of the Monolith, you will pass over the hall with large windows, and then go along the wall with the windows all the way and to the left of the room.
Thank you, Director, for your confidence. I will not fail you. Glory to the Monolith!
I greet you, brother!
You're on time, brother, we are ready, we were waiting for you.
What are your plans?
We'll advance slowly, going as a group, with you in the lead. All right, let's go!
Glory to the Monolith! God be with us with his strength and power!
Director, you will again teach me ... okay ... I hear and obey. Director, I have brought good news.

That's good that you are patient and obedient. They have already reported to me about your feats. You are a fine person! Glory to the Monolith! He does not abandon his children but helps them in difficult times.
Well infidel should I shoot you like a dog?
I beg you do not kill me.
You and your people have defiled the 'Holy Places'; there is no mercy for you.
Brother ... Brother, do not kill me ... I ... I sincerely want to believe, I am ready to join with you. I beg you, give me a med kit.
Okay here's a med kit.
I don't have a med kit, die trying infidel!
Thank you brother! Listen I have a formula for transmutations. I'll record it onto your PDA. It surely will come in handy.
I'm listening brother.
Brother you have proved you have a good side. I see that you are intelligent. I have a special mission for you.
Speak Solomon, I am glad that you trust me, especially, a skilled soldier such as yourself.

Brother, when we came here, the place was not deserted. What we found here was a detachment of military stalkers. But, glory to the Monolith, we succeeded in vanquishing them but lost many brothers in the process. From one of our brothers, who incidentally, was a former Special Forces soldier, and had participated in the raid, we learnt that they were looking for documents that a scientist, from before the Big Bang (Dorodina was his name), had carefully collected and stored into three fireproof cases. We were not able to find them ... But we were able to track the location of the 2 of the cases, while the third seems to have vanished into thin air. I'll put their coordinates on your PDA. Well, soldier, here are your orders: dig up entire western unit Of Chernobyl-2 and find the three cases. One more thing, we've located a weak signal that could be the third case, it's coming from outside the upper levels of the Sarcophagus. The only way to get there is to pass through the teleport anomalies. My men are too afraid to use them.
Solomon I have the might and will of the Monolith, everything I need and more. My faith will help me, I am ready!
Glory to the Monolith, I have not failed you, Solomon.
You found them?
Yes Solomon, here are they - all three.

Your services to the flock are great! You are an example of a good brother. Your humility and hard work will not go unnoticed. The Monolith sees and hears all. You have prepared for a great honour. In the meantime, let me reward you. Here, take 5 F-1 grenades, let our enemies fear you more!
Brother, a matter exists.
Is there something I can do for you?

Brother help me. Solomon gave my mate and I the job of clearing mutants from the CNPP-2 territory, but we were drunk and trouble occurred. My partner was carried off by snorks ... OMG ... they gorged on him. The Monolith were angered at what happened. But they gave me a second chance. So I have two days left and I'm afraid to go. But what do I say to Solomon? I need to present the evidence he needs, but where can I get it if I don't go. Please, can you help me by getting eight snork feet? In return I will give you six boxes of buckshot. But be careful, Snorks jump off the roofs like crazy grasshoppers! They live not far from here, just west of our camp. But again, be careful! Look up at the roofs and entice them down.
I'll get your snork feet. Just do not drink any more, brother. We have embarked on the path of 'Truth'. It's a sin to booze.
Well, brother?
I brought the Snorks feet.
Eight pieces? Thanks brother, you really saved me! Here, take the buckshot as I promised.
I greet you Charon! Glory to the Monolith!

Soldier, above us is the Monolith Control Bunker. We wish, in the course of time, to create a Control Centre there to coordinate and manage our resources, but there ... ah ... in the darkness, are many mutants.
Director, what should I do?

The task is a simple one, clean up the Monolith Control Bunker of all mutants. And who knows how many are there, so be careful. The passage through Chernobyl-2 is currently blocked. So go through the Sarcophagus room to Chernobyl-1. The entrance to the Control Bunker is around there, look on your PDA I've marked its location. Oh and here for you are a couple of med kits, and cartridges for the AK just in case. I will also give you my Winchester shotgun, which often helped me at difficult times. Take care of it and it will faithfully serve you. Let this be your reward from me for your skill and dedication.
I was in the bunker.
Well what did you find there?
A freak'n bizillion bloodsuckers, zombies and burers. So I eliminated everything that moved.
Good as always. I was not mistaken when I chose you for the job.
Director, is there any serious work?
Are you ready for some serious work?
I believe so. I want to earn your more of your trust.
You're a young soldier, full of promise, so you now have to go through additional training. Go to your saviour Mervin, he will give you a few more lessons.
Where will I find him?
Mervin is the keeper of Monolith. You'll find him there, in the Sarcophagus room, next to our 'Treasure'.
Good, I will go and find Mervin.
Greetings Mervin. Charon sent me.

Yes, Charon told me you were coming. He indicates that as a whole he is satisfied with you, and sees for you great prospects, but you have arrogance and have a lot of dissent. In connection with all that it is required to teach you the power of the spirit, courage, as well as humility and tolerance. Just do not perceive it as punishment. This is the special training that each new soldier has to pass, in order to earn the confidence of the Director.
I see.
Hello Charon. Mervin said that you had an urgent matter.

Yes soldier, there is an urgent matter: there is a doctor - his name is Swamp Doctor. He lives in the Swamps, far from Pripyat, well, it does not matter. He makes drugs for us that are hard to get, in return for rare and valuable artifacts which can only be found here, in the CNPP territory. Now we have many patients, especially here at CNPP-2. So: there's an urgent need to go to Pripyat, meet with the Doctor or his messenger, and bring back some medication. The doctor himself rarely comes, usually sends his apprentice - they call him Feldsher, a small annoying ... But okay, closer to the point: I have no one but you to send, so get ready for the road.
Where is the meeting place in Pripyat?

Look in the stadium, the Doctor and his pupil Feldsher normally go there when they come to Pripyat. I'll mark the spot on your PDA. I'll give you the coordinates for the transition point from the Sarcophagus to Chernobyl, from there I hope you will find how to get to Pripyat.
Director, here are the drugs.
Let me see, well ... seems, like that's all that's needed. What did you think of the Doctor?
There was no doctor, just his pupil, Feldsher. A normal guy. It's a pity he's not one of us. However he asked me for artifacts, says that we owed him, I had to find some.

I see! About those medical guys, I do not like them and they don't like me. We would have shot them a long time ago, but the Swamp Doctor ... well, he was the only doctor in the area so we had to endure them. The last time we bought medicine from the Doctor he shot my messenger. He said that the messenger spoke to him rudely. I will not forgive him for this ... all in good time.
Okay Charon I understand.
Hello are you Clerk?
Yes that's me. Brother, one cannot go further. We noticed a detachment of military, clearly not noobs, killed two of my scouts, which had no time to utter a word.
Brother I'm in a hurry. I have an urgent request from Charon. By the way, you have a gangster's mug. Are you a bandit?

It's a common face, I did not choose it! Yes I was a bandit. In one skirmish in Pripyat with a detachment of Monolith I was wounded. Solomon found me, and did not kill me. He cured me instead and then enlightened me and sent me on the right path. So now I'm in his debt. Now I faithfully serve the Monolith! All right, enough philosophy, I am restless. Help me out brother! I have to personally answer to Charon! He told me he would blow off my head because there are enemies in the territory. There is a gun I have, a PP Bison with a removable scope. If you help us it's yours.
It is agreeable brother I'll help you. Then I have one more question. But first, let's do it. We advance.
You ok Clerk?
Son of a bitch! Many of our brothers are dead. Yes I'm in one piece. Glory to the Monolith. Although I think, I took a hit. Damn!
Well take care of yourself.
Yup! Here as promised, the gun, a little ammunition and a scope. God be with you and the strength and spirit of the Monolith!
Clerk I'm performing a task for Solomon and only you can help me.
You bailed me out and I am already indebted to Solomon. So how can I help you?

Solomon asked me to bring him something, namely canned food from Pripyat and a container of medical supplies, which, he says Mahon hid somewhere in the Chernobyl area and he said you know where it is. Solomon, you can trust for sure.
So that's it ... Well, the exact place I'll can't tell you because I don't know. I didn't see Mahon hide the container, but out of the corner of my eye I saw in which direction he went.
Well, I do not know what to look for or where as I'm a stranger in these parts. Just tell me the approximate direction.

About two months ago Mahon came here to Chernobyl NPP, he was very reserved and taciturn. He only asked to send a patrol to the eastern part of the Chernobyl NPP and clear the area of mutants. My guys did what was asked of them, and then came back and reported. He then went to one and asked him not to escort him. I saw that he had a metal container probably full of drugs. He returned later without it. I saw that he went through the eastern gate, not far from where we are now. He then walked around the locomotive and up towards the old freight train cars. That's where you should look, you may find it somewhere around there.
Understood! I will try to find the container in the eastern part of Chernobyl.
Greetings, Charon sent me.
What he does wish?
Medicines, as always.
So, tell him that he will not give any. Several times he was given credit, but this time we have lost patience. He needs to pay up first.
Hmmm ... Feldsher, I cannot go without medicine, we have a lot of patients.
Do you wish to obtain the medicines? Well then you pay! How does he not understand that I need artifacts and mutant parts to produce medicines? If there are no artifacts then there are no drugs.
Feldsher what you need? I'll try to get them.
Two Night Star artifacts.
Here Feldsher I have two. I found them on the way here.
I don't have a Night Star. Can I bring something else?
Then bring to me 10 blind dog tails.
I have them. Here, take them.
I don't have that many tails, I will go find some more.
You're a fine person, I look at you and don't understand why you are with them, do you realise they are fanatics?
We are not fanatics we believe in the truth. Although, quite frankly I actually was confused.

You yourself do not believe in what you say ... I've heard your predecessors say similar words. I used to watch their eyes. All those who came before you, their eyes were empty, and yours ... Yours burn! It's not my business, of course, but think, why and for what reason you believe in this ... burden. Carrying this burden is not easy, it's mysterious and incomprehensible, but whatever you say, but it's still just a burden.
Feldsher, I advise you not to utter such words in my presence.
Okay, I will not detain you any longer, just listen to your heart, trust it, and it will give you the right advice as given by a Doctor.
That was done quickly. I look at you and don't understand your situtation. Have you forgotten that you are among fanatics?
Feldsher, do you do repairs?
I do a little repairs.
Repair the first gun.
Repair the second gun.
Repair my armour.
Yeah right you crook, at those prices, you must be crazy. I'll wait.
Well, lookie here, as good as new.
Yeah, something had to be done to bring this suit into good repair. All the plates were changed.
Well, thank you.
Listen, in my opinion, now it's even better than when it was new.
There is something else, will you look?
Yes, what do we have here?
Greetings to you, Master.
Come, my brother, I'm listening.
Master, I brought something, take a look.
Artifacts?
I have a Stone Flower.
I have a Stone Blood.
I have a Night Star.
I have a Soul.
I have a Spring.
I have a Crystal.
I have a Goldfish.
I have a Meat Chunk.
I have a Gravi.
Oh, forgive me teacher, I was mistaken.
Not much ... Well, here's three packs of ammo for the AK, a med kit and one antirad.
Slim pickings, well, okay, take two regular med kits.

Oh-oh-oh, A Night Star! Let me look at it ... Don't see them very often around here. Good for you, here's ammo: 5 packs of armour piercing rounds for the Storm, two scientific med kits and two antirads.
Rare artefact, you deserve a decoration! Here, NATO cartridges, 5 packs, plus 3 scientific med kits.
It has been a long time since anyone has brought me a Spring. Here, for your SVU, are 5 packs of armour-piercing bullets and 2 antirads.
You have brought the Crystal? I'm pleased! Take 5 packs of standard cartridges for the Val, and two army med kits.
For the Goldfish take this: Five packs of armour-piercing cartridges for the AK, two army med kits and five cans of food.
For the Meat Chunk, I will give you 3 boxes of ammo for the AK, a standard med kit and 4 pieces of sausage.
For the Gravi, here are 3 packs of normal NATO rounds, 2 standard med kits and 4 pieces of sausage.
Master, I need something repaired.
Yes our enemies are not asleep, let's take a look.
Repair the first gun.
Repair the second gun.
Repair the armour.
Master, I don't have enough money.
Here is your weapon, brother, let our enemies tremble.
Armour repaired. Glory to the Monolith! To spite our enemies, one additional brother is ready to protect our truth.
I thank you, Master.
I am again ready to bear truth to the unbelievers. Glory to the Monolith!!!
Master, there is still something.
Okay, give me a look:
Director, have I overheard that Mercenaries have captured our base in Pripyat?
Yes there is this matter, we must drive them from Pripyat, and persecute them, bit by bit.
Well, is it time for us to show them who is the owner of Pripyat?

I think so. Listen, soldier, Mahon is already there with his men. Get prepared and go. Talk to him, he will explain all to you. But consider this: Mahon - is my right hand man, I will hold you personally responsible if he dies during the assault. On your return, you will continue your special training with Mervin.
Greetings to you, Director, Victory! Mahon is alive and well.

Mahon has already reported. You have done well! Glory to the Monolith, it leaves us in an easier position. I don't think they will attack us again for a long time. But we can't be complacent, is not worth it. We have many enemies, much...
I serve the Monolith!
Teacher, I am here to help out.

What took you so long?! You see these guys with me, they are the best of the best! Maybe someday you'll be one of them. The 'Inner Circle'. Grasp that? In short, our motto: 'no fear, no mercy, no pain, no compassion'. But plenty of vodka!
Just a few mutants, sir. I hope I'll someday be one of the best too. Well Mahon shall we move on?
Let's go brother. We've sat here for too long a time already.
Teacher you called me?
Wait... give me time to recover my breath.
Mahon don't hurry, all is sweet. It's over.
It's not all over yet. It is still necessary to cleanse the central area. Take the guys and go in the direction of the Lenin Monument.
I'm on my way.
Fuuuf ... I'm exhausted, what a day.
Yes it was hard work. But the results were positive. We freed our base and the City centre. Now the Mercenaries only hold the outskirts. Do not worry, we will get there.
Okay Mahon I need to go, I have to report to Charon.
Brother take this anomaly detector. It's not the best, but it can save your life that's for sure.
Feldsher do you have something to sell?
For sale yes, but I also offer an exchange service: you bring me mutant parts, but bear in mind: I only take parts in bulk, 10 pieces at a time. These I will exchange for med kits and ammo.
That's good, what I find I'll bring.
Here I have something.
What have you got?
I have 10 Flesh's eyes
I have 10 Boar hooves.
I have 10 Blind dog tails.
I have 10 Pseudo-dog tails.
I have 10 Bloodsucker tentacles.
I have 10 Burer hands.
I have 10 Zombie hands.
I have 10 Snork's feet.
I have 10 Tushkano heads.
I have 10 Controller hands.
I have 10 Pseudogiant paws.
I have 10 Chimera claws.
Unfortunately today I have zip.
Give them to me, good medicines are obtained from them! In return you get 4 scientific med kits.
For 10 Boar hooves - 4 army med kits.
But how did you get them? Fine person! Here are 4 boxes of buckshot.
Pseudo-dogs are very risky; I did not think that you were capable. Here are 4 F1 grenades.
10 Bloodsucker tentacles! You are a dangerous man! Here are 4 boxes of armour-piercing cartridges for the Vintorez.
10 Burer hands! Where did you find them? Well it's agreeable - here are four boxes of NATO armour-piercing cartridges.
For the civilian Zombies hands, I'll give you ... I will give you 5 boxes of buckshot.
Snorks, brrr ... I don't like them, I've had a nasty encounter with them. Here are four med kits.
Tushkanos, you have to be agile to kill them. Here are 5 boxes of 9x18 armour-piercing cartridges.
Controllers, oh mother, well you ... okay, here's 5 antirads.
Pseudogiant? Pseudogiant, oh yeah, tough creatures. Here, for you 7 boxes of standard NATO cartridges.
Chimera - risky monster, here for you, 5 boxes of armour-piercing cartridges for the AK.
When you have something, return.
What do you want, brother?

Brother, I need your help. Here, at the arse end of the world, there are no shops, but we're all human and need food and meds to survive this hell. Charon usually solves this, but so far has done little. While we wait for him, we swell from hunger and rot from cholera.
How I can you help?

Sooner or later Charon will send you to Pripyat. Where there is a shop, it is certainly not a clothing shop, it's a former grocery store. But I'm almost 100% sure there are products there. I do not know, like maybe canned food ... may be something else. Brother help us, if you find something, bring it back. But that's not all, only one doctor prepares and supplies our brotherhood with medicine, and Mahon rations them for my guys with whom we protect the inner CNPP territory. This is all due to the fact that we had an argument with him on the subject of our faith, so he takes revenge slowly. But I know that Mahon's caches are filled with medications in the CNPP territory. One of our brothers, a former bandit called Clerk, told me. From the Sarcophagus going to Pripyat is possible only through the external CNPP territory, and there you will find Clerk, a senior guard. Be sure to talk to him, tell him about my request, and find what I am asking you to bring. He will help, because he owes me a debt.
Yes brother I'll help you. While I'm in Pripyat I will search all the grocery stores for food, and with Clerk's help I will also search the CNPP territory for the medications.
Well brother I've brought good news.
What's the news?

I was in Pripyat, I found this grocery store and it was empty. It seemed to me that someone had been there before, apparently. But still searching I found one box of canned food. I was also able to find Mahon's drug cache in the CNPP territory. It was not easy I tell you, it was very hard.
Canned food is good, it has less radiation. Well give me what you brought. Also I wish to reward you. Here, choose something:
Optics for NATO weapons.
Optics for Russian weapons.
Submachine gun HK MP5K-N modified, chambered for 9x18.
I'll take the optics for the Sig-550.
I'll take the optics for the AK-74.
I'll take the 'HK MP5K-N' modified.
My training is completed, Director. How else can I help you?

Soldier there is a mission for you. Clerk's men have caught a stalker. He is now in the CNPP-2 territory. Your task is to interrogate him and find out everything he knows. Spies like him need to be eliminated. Only don't you do it. Clerk will do everything himself. He knows how to solve such problems. Report back to me when you're finished.
I'm on my way.
Well, tell me who are you?
Friend, don't kill me, I will tell all.
Stop whining, you knew what you were doing. Only a confession may save you now.
Brother, brother, I will tell you everything, if you just don't kill me.
For the last time, who are you and what are you looking for?
Earring ... my name is Earring. I ... I was sent by Ghost ... I mean three of us were, but two were killed. He sent us here to find a way into the Control Bunker.
Why did you need to get into the bunker? And who is this 'Ghost'?
Doc ... ah ... some important documents. A map of the underground passages between Pripyat and the Sarcophagus. I think, but I'm not sure. Brother have pity. That's all I can tell you.
Who is this 'Ghost'?

He seems to be former Military, maybe KGB. He ... He ... I ... We recently worked together. He was looking for a way into the Sarcophagus, bypassing the posts. Why? I do not know, Ghost never told me anything in detail.
Where do I find him?
I don't know precisely, but he will be either in Pripyat or at the Radar where his base is. I'm not positive.
The interrogation is finished.
No brother! Brother don't kill me. No need to ... I beg you, tell Clerk to let me go. I told you all I know.
I said the interrogation is finished.
Greetings Director. Glory to the Monolith!
What news did you bring soldier?

I questioned the spy. Earring was his name, he sought with two other stalkers some documents, a map of the Pripyat underground. He could be lying, though unlikely, Clerk is a true beast. Yet the spy mentioned a stalker named Ghost.
Ghost ... Ghost, the name is familiar. I'm sure it has something to do with the Swamp Doctor and his assistant Feldsher. Okay soldier rest for now. I will call you when I need you again.
Director, is there any work? If I sit for too long, I get nervous...
You're a good soldier! I will soon present you with a serious reward. But, at the moment there is no work. I'll call you when you're needed. So for now, relax, pray and fortify your faith!
Feldsher, you requested me to visit.
Yes, yes, your help is necessary.
What has happened?
I do not know if you have heard anything about a man called Ghost, but if you have, it's probably bad, but I need your help.
Of course, I heard about him recently. I would like to have a word with Ghost.
So you will have a talk, but there is a small problem.
This is getting interesting.
In order to talk to him, you must first free him. He was captured by Mercenaries. He's being held in Pripyat, I'll load the coordinates into your PDA.
It is strange that they did not shoot him.

Nothing strange about it. They are not fanatics such as your brothers, who find it easier to kill than to gain information. I suspect that the real reason they didn't was so they could get to me and the Doctor.
Why do you think that?
They came to us several times, but the Doctor and I refused to treat them. So now they harbour a grudge against us.
You have strange scruples ... As I understand it, you and the Doctor are not exactly thrilled with us, but you still deliver healing, and by your standards, are we really any better than them?

You are fanatics. At least half of you or maybe more, are controlled. I don't know how you manage with that, but I hope to find out. And you ... yes ... even you have you not noticed that you're not your own master. So, I'm sorry for you.

An interesting theory. Worst of all, unfortunately, is that I don't remember a thing, who or what I was before I got here. I can't remember my name or why I was in the Zone. I cannot remember anything before Pripyat. My memories start from when Mervin pulled me out of an anomaly ... Okay, give me Ghost's coordinates, I'll go and do what I do best - kill!
Give me your PDA ... Yes, I've marked the place. If all goes well, come back here, I have something for you.
Are you Ghost?
A minute ago I was, but now I'm not sure. This is the first time the Monolith has helped me. Usually all they want to give me is a bullet in the head.
This is no joke, Feldsher sent me. Let's go. Follow me.
Ah Feldsher, I underestimated him! I thought he just blindly carried out assignments from the Doctor.
Come on let's go.
Well you're free now.
My freedom seems conditional. You saved me from the Mercenaries so that you can control me.

Clever, but I'm growing tired of this. First Feldsher, now you. This Theory of a device or something out there, controlling us. Let's talk about facts. What documents were you looking for at the CNPP?

What are you talking about? Ahh ... I understand. So, they got caught? I did not have anyone else available, and the documents were needed. All that was required of them was to conduct, so to speak, a reconnaissance of the CNPP to see where and how your brothers were positioned.
What kind of documents?
Documents ... After all, don't you believe there is a device that controls you? The Doctor and I do. That is what we seek. Its location is somewhere in the Sarcophagus. But where, is unknown to me.
What's happened to me, half a day ago, I wanted to shoot you, but now I do not know. But bear in mind that if you get caught again, I won't be sorry.
Feldsher, Ghost is free.
Thank you, now I'm more convinced that I was right about you. You'll have to meet with the Doctor and talk to him; he can explain everything better than I. He's certainly able to help you.
I appreciate your concern, but I don't need your help. Let me follow my path to true 'C-Consciousness'. Also, warn Ghost that if our paths cross again, I won't save him.
You are stubborn, but oh well. Here, I have a recipe for transmutation, keep it, you may need it.
Director, you called me?
Yes I did. We found Ghost. He's in Pripyat.
What now?
I learned some things about him. He needs to be liquidated, while he's still alive our work can't continue. I can think of no one better than you. So you get the honour of killing this young reptile.
I will not let you down, Charon!
Feldsher, what happened?
Have you been given the task to kill Ghost?
Once again I'm amazed at your knowledge. I think you know more about me than I do.
I am the assistant of the Doctor who lives in the Swamp, and don't forget it. Some patients, so to speak, out of a sense of gratitude for the Doctor, help ... well, I hope you understand.
Okay Feldsher get to the point.
You must not kill Ghost.
I have my orders! Even though it displeases me, I must, Ghost is a shady character.
Mmmm ... I do not want to, but ... probably will have to ...
What are you talking about? Hey...
Oh what happened to me? I feel sick. I feel like shit.
Nothing, be a little patient. Relax! I injected you with a potent sedative. That, let's just say, is the after-effects from it.
My head, something's wrong, I can't remember anything.

Don't worry your memory will return, but gradually. I hope this will help you remember who you really are and how you ended up in Pripyat. I do not know what to call you; you're out there in his Brotherhood almost without a name, brothers, in one word, yes. I'll give you a helmet to use. Don't lose or sell it, it will protect you against psionic radiation. If you take it off, then the Monolith will control you again.

Man give me time to recover ... I ... my name is Strelok, I remember! I remembered why I came to Pripyat. I'm looking for my brother! You ... do you by chance know anything about a stalker nicknamed 'Captain', and the raid by Stalkers on the Sarcophagus more than two years ago?

Well hello Strelok! I congratulate you on your return to yourself. I don't know of a Stalker called 'Captain', nor have I heard of a raid on the Sarcophagus two years ago, as I only recently arrived in the Zone ... Yes, and still, I just want to remind you: do not forget, your previous friends - now are no longer your friends. So, don't go back to Chernobyl it's unlikely they'll be happy to see you. I advise you to get away from Pripyat. You have to get to the Swamp Doctor - He can answer your many questions, maybe he knows something about your brother. Ghost can help you get to the Swamp. Speaking of Ghost, he is in danger; I know that Charon always insures against failure, he would have sent others in case you didn't succeed. You need Ghost alive, so do not let him die.
Feldsher or whoever you are, I don't remember Ghost, Charon, or the others. Why can't you take me to the doctor?

You'll see, your memory will return gradually. We're stuck here in Pripyat. The old route to the Swamps through the Radar is now inaccessible, and yet another ... But as I said, Ghost can help you find the path to the Swamps, and I still have some business here in Pripyat. I'll download Ghosts position to your PDA. You shouldn't have any trouble finding it. It's possible Charon's people are already there. I hope you haven't forgotten how to use weapons.
I think it's innate ... Okay, I'll find Ghost.
Are you Ghost? I think we've met before.
Something like that.
No No, I do not remember.

Recently ... well you still don't remember. Listen to me, Feldsher asked me take you away from Pripyat to the Swamps to the Doctor, but there is a problem. The passage down to the Radar is being monitored by Mercenaries. And even if you get through, further down there has recently formed a sufficiently strong Psy-emission where no gun will help you, and you will die rapidly and painfully. When it moves around is unknown, but you have no time to wait. There is one additional Secret Path to the Swamps from Pripyat. But where is it? There is information somewhere in Chernobyl's Control Bunker. There should be secret documents there. If you find them bring them to me and I'll try to decipher them. They should show the transition point. Be careful in there. Do you remember your way back to the bunker?
Yes I remember. I will try to get the documents.
Ghost here are the documents from the Control Bunker.

Got them? Good for you! I'll have a look at them. Yeah ... so ... all figured out. Now you go to Fang, he will escort you to the transition place. I'll load the coordinates of the transition to your PDA, and he'll show you the way, it's not far from here, and it's safer if you both go.
Copy that! I'm already going. Yes, I think I remember everything now. I recall for example that I recently rescued you from captivity by the Mercenaries.
I see your memory is coming back quickly. Okay go. There's no time to waste. Good luck and thank you!
Stay healthy, Ghost, I hope to see you again.
Are you the tooth fairy er ... I mean Fang?
Wise ass! Yes, Ghost told me you were coming. Are you ready to go?
Yes I'm ready! I'm all finished here.
We'll go slowly. We want to avoid any Monolith patrols. Let's go.
Are we there?
Yes, here look, the transition to the Swamps is just behind me. I've marked it on your PDA. All right brother so long. Good luck, I'll be seeing you. Give the Doctor my regards.
And to you too. I'm sure we'll meet again.
Wait, wait a minute ... there is something Ghost wants from us. Yeah, that's ... he sent a message. In short, he asks us to return.
Shit! We've almost crossed from Pripyat to the Swamps and now he wants us to return.
Don't worry it'll be quick. Ghost said that he had forgotten something very important to convey to the Doctor.
Ah okay then let's go back to Ghost.
Hello again. Is there something I can do for you?

I forgot, Feldsher has a gift for you, three army med kits and something unique, a Gravity Gun. With this weapon you can pull things to you like weapons, artifacts, corpses, anything that can move. You can use it to make anomalies from artifacts. Pick them with second fire mode and when you shoot the artefact, it's transformed into the anomaly that created it. It's a terrible weapon, okay? Be careful where you create them, Burner or Springboard anomalies can lead to dire consequences, especially in the Swamps. Here, take this, as they say, good luck, brother.
And good luck to you. Please thank Feldsher for me. Do you know if something terrible awaits me there?

Stick to your guns! You are a clever man so everything will be fine! If anything you know where to find us. Now go, the Doctor is waiting. Oh and my advice to you, do not try to touch the Doctors patients. He would not like that, get it?
I understand. I'll go to the Doctor in the Swamps, till we meet again.
You are who?
You don't know, you bastard?
You don't believe me? I really don't know. Feldsher in Pripyat thoroughly cleansed my mind.
You know Feldsher?
Do I know Feldsher? Yes he told me he cleared my head. I'm as pure as an infant. Like being reborn.
Feldsher is the assistant to the Swamp Doctor, but the Doctor told me nothing about you ... hmmm.
Believe me I'm not lying I simply don't know. I have not yet met the Swamp Doctor, but I've heard a lot about him from Feldsher.
What is your name?
My name is Strelok! You stole all my weapons, gear, loot and money. Give it all back you jack ass.

Don't yell at me! I did not take your things or your money. I don't do such things. I found you here lying unconscious as they say, in your shorts. Apparently those who robbed you had decided that you had already paid your dues, otherwise they would not have left you alive. Consider yourself lucky.
If not you, then who mugged and robbed me?

I don't know. I can only assume that it was one of your old friends from the Sarcophagus. Now listen here Strelok, do not move, I'll slowly ... very slowly give you a shotgun and some ammunition and some army med kits. Understand?
I may have been reborn, but I'm not stupid.
Listen, why do you help me?
It's because of the Doctor. Thank him if you see him. He together with Feldsher once saved me. They cleansed my mind as they did yours. I now find myself obligated to him for the rest of my life.
But why have you not left?

Where to? And why? I am in good standing with Charon. He gave me command of CNPP-2. Here I am practically my own master. Yes sometimes it is necessary to carry out his dirty work. But then you do not know how long I would survive on the side of their enemies. Yes, I am old now.
Listen I'm going through to the other side. Do you have a request?
Hmmm ... Yes perhaps there is one thing. I'd like to send a parcel to the 'Mainland'. I have a daughter that I haven't seen for about ten years.
Wow that's a long time. I'm unlikely to find her.

There is a person at the Cordon, a merchant they call Barkeep, he will help you. When I was a loner I was amazed at what kind of contacts we had. If you do it, I'll give you a recipe for transmutation.
It's not necessary, I'll take the parcel to Barkeep.
It is necessary brother, I am thankful, such are the times. Well then since you've agreed I'll send the Barkeep a note. Perhaps he still remembers me. I'll download the recipe onto your PDA.
Barkeep, I've brought a parcel from Solomon who is in the CNPP.
What am I to do with it?
It needs be sent to The Grand Theatre, to Solomon's daughter.

Moscow Arts Theatre! Are you crazy? Most come here from the CNPP to the Cordon to take a rest for a week or two, to drink litres of Vodka, but you, you utter such nonsense. Are you hunting for a woman? Do not bother me about this kind of stuff.
Barkeep I'm not here to drink Vodka or hunt for a woman. I just need a parcel delivered. What do you want in return?
Do you think it's that easy? There too are people who need to be paid off.
Okay Barkeep what do you need in return?
Two Crystal artifacts, Got any?
Here, take them.
I don't have any.
Then two Pellicle artifacts.
Here, take them.
I don't have any.
When you have something then come back.
Give me the Crystals, do not worry, I have reliable channels, everything is tiptop.
Give me the Pellicles, do not worry, I have reliable channels, everything is tiptop.
Hello Barkeep! How about the shipment?
Have you got them?
Yes I have two Crystal artifacts.
Yes I have two Pellicle artifacts.
No, Okay I'll go look for them.
Give me the Crystals, do not worry, I have reliable channels, everything is tiptop.
Give me the Pellicles, do not worry, I have reliable channels, everything is tiptop.
Well, friend, lucky I got here in time.
I thank you Stalker. I'm still in one piece.
Apart from that, who are you?
I'm called Zahar.
What are you doing here, can't you see it's a dangerous place?
I live here alone, I don't bother the mutants, and they leave me alone, so we live in peace, but these ... they've strayed from Pripyat. It's crazy, it's the first time I've seen them.
Zahar why don't you choose another place? Not only is it not safe here, but lonely.

Previously, I worked at the CNPP, I lived in Pripyat, with my family and friends. And then the disaster ... my wife died, the children too ... And I ... I was the only one of my family to survive, only because of the work I was doing at the time. I was an electrician installing a cable underground. Where do I go now? Here is my family, my home.
I'm sorry for your pain and loss. I did not know.
Thank you, but time heals all wounds.
Zahar, what's the matter?
I need to find Cyril.
Who is he?
He is a bloodsucker, a friend of mine. A boar almost ripped him to death, but I was able to heal him. And since we live together, in honour of my dead son, I named him Cyril.
Yeah, one word - Z.O.N.A.
Help me, brother, find him! I am afraid that it you don't, he will be ripped to pieces. He does not touch locals, he prefers boars, and these stray ... it can be.
But, what if ... Won't he attack? He does not know me?

Since I cured him, he has not killed one person, although I must say, he has not seen any for a long time. There were several bandits, who survived when they emptied their cache, and then departed, to the warehouses. If you help me, I will be in your debt, and I will even reveal to you the transition point from the 'Military Warehouses' back to here to the "ATP". This way will come in handy.
Okay, I will look for the beast. But, if it attacks me, don't blame me if I don't let it have me for dinner.
Regards, Zahar.
Hello, but I do not know what to call you.
My name is Strelok. I found Cyril - he was almost eaten by wild boars, apparently, not only he loves them.

Thank you, twice you've helped me. Here's a recipe for transmutations, I found it on a dead Dutier in Pripyat, take it, is useful. And, as promised, the reverse transition from the 'Military Warehouses' to the "ATP".
Well Zahar, it's time for me to go, thank you for your hospitality.
What's an old man to do now? Well, good luck.
Do you need anything?

Well, actually, I do have a request. A man exists, by the name of Dan, we previously were neighbours, I remember him as a child. He lived with his mother, his father had died. Well, some might say, I replaced his father. Now that my family has perished, he is the closest to having relative I have. But where is he? I know that he's in the Zone, but what is his destiny?
Is there is a network of Stalkers, you can search through? Do you have a PDA?
No, Strelok, I don't. I do not know how to use one. A letter is personal, I do not want anyone to read it. In general, a request from me to you: If you find Dan, give him this.
Okay Zahar, if I find Dan, I'll give it to him.
You go now, I enjoyed our conversations, they were never boring. It's not the same talking to Cyril.
Hi Zahar, it's been a long time.
Yeah, a long time ... While you were away, something happened.
What happened?
Bandits came, they told me to clear out. They gave me two days. But I've become accustomed to this place. Where will I go? They are about to arrive any minute, I await them...
Well, we'll see about that. Zahar, do not worry, help has arrived.
Oh, Strelok, there's so many of them, I fear they will overpower you.
Well, Zahar, I come well prepared, so do not worry!
Well, old man, I told you there was nothing to worry about!
Well, you outsmarted them. It was not easy, my son ... Thank you.
Okay, old man you're alive and well.
Here, take something, in gratitude.
Zahar, have you things to trade?
I can offer buckshot, med kits or standard cartridges for the AK.
I'll take the Buckshot.
I'll take the med kit.
I'll take the cartridges for the AK.
I can exchange five packs of buckshot for either 8 Blind dog tails, 6 Boar hooves, 6 Chimera claws or 2 Wrenched artifacts.
Zahar, I have eight Blind Dogs tails.
Zahar, I have six Boars hooves.
Zahar, I have six Chimera claws.
Zahar, I have the Wrenched artefact.
I have nothing today.
I exchange three med kits for either 8 Pseudo-dog tails, or a Slug, or a Stone Flower, or a Gravi artefact.
Zahar, I have eight Pseudo-dog tails.
Zahar, I have a Slug.
Zahar, I have a Stone Flower.
Zahar, I have a Gravi.
I'll exchange five packs of standard cartridges for the AK for either six Bloodsucker tentacles, a Meat Chunk, or two Slime, or two Jellyfish artifacts.
Zahar, I have six Bloodsucker tentacles.
Zahar, I have a Meat Chunk.
Zahar, I have two Slime.
Zahar, I have two Jellyfish.
Oh, I've almost forgotten ... It seems that I have something for you.
What?
News from your friend ... From Zahar. You do know him?
Zahar? I haven't heard from him for a very long time. I thought that maybe he died. Where did meet you meet him? How is my old friend doing?
Zahar's all right, he has long been a hunter in the forests, wandering through the fields. He asked me to deliver a letter to you. He says he wants to make peace.
Does he, the "old fogy"! I never got angry at him nor do I hold a grudge. Foolishly, we had a falling-out. Anyway, that is - it is ... Good news you have brought me, man.
Here, keep the letter.
Hey guys, who are you?
We are Freedom members, and who are you?
I'm called Strelok.
Strelok, are you interested in some work? If you help us, we will be in your debt.
What sort of work?

Look, you see the base nearby? Well there are soldiers there. Belchuk, their Commander is a rare breed. They caught three of our guys last night near the wall. That bitch, wait till I get my hands on him.
Yeah I see, what's next?

This base is necessary to us. If we don't keep the soldiers out, for Stalkers, the passage into the centre of the Zone is closed. So we look for free Stalkers who are not afraid to come with us. As you see, we are only a small group. Another extra gun wouldn't hurt. Will you come with us? Do not worry, I'll pay well. Brother, you think about it, the Zone is our home, yours and mine, and no soldier should dictate where and why we go. With them here, every day is a risk. The other day we lost a friend ...This Belchuk is a putz. They fall greedily to power and our brothers who get caught - are shot on the spot.
Okay, okay brother, you persuaded me, well when do we do this?
Right now.
Well, let's go.
Well, Lukash, the base is our! Belchuk is dead.
Yes, the job is half done.
What do you mean, half done? You said that it was only necessary to capture the base.. well it's done.
We have more soldiers to dislodge at the Barrier, and then the route to the centre will be relatively free.
Yeah right, but why didn't you tell me before?
If I did you may not have agreed to help. Now's the time to seize the Barrier, don't worry you will be paid. Come on brother, hurry while the soldiers are off guard.
Am I the only one to go?
No, certainly not, Cap and the boys will go with you. Stick with Cap, but he must survive!
Happily I agree!
All is good, Lukash, the job is done.
Yes, it worked well! You are indeed a master, you know.
Well, what's the situation?

Well of course, as I promised. Incidentally Strelok, I see that you are not like the rest of the vagrants around here, who are just searching for profit. I see fire in your eyes. What are you doing here in the Zone, if it's not a secret?

You're right, I don't seek profit - I'm looking for my brother, he was lost under very obscure and unexplained circumstances. I'm trying to find a trace of my brother, and maybe with luck - he himself. Have you heard of a man called 'Captain'? More than two years ago he, with a group of other Stalkers, went to the Sarcophagus?
No, I've not heard of a Stalker by that name. About the sortie into the heart of the Zone, I heard from others. Anything else I do not know. Anyhow take this reward.
Nevertheless thank you Lukash. Ok, give me my reward.
Halt!
Hello!
Listen peasant, this territory is ours and cannot be travelled free of charge.
How much?
2,000 rubles for a one-time pass through our territory.
Buggers, I left my Travellers checks at home.
Cash then!

Well, I see you're a business man. When returning you will see us, so do not forget to approach me! Here Duke is the main dude, he always was and always will be our leader. Remember, no cash, no passage!
Hello.
Good day, I have a business proposal for you.
What's the proposal?
I purchase PDA's of dead stalkers.
Why do you need them?

Well, I should inform you as much as possible as the profession requires. Listen, for 10 PDA's I'll give you a few small things, and that would be: ammunition, medical supplies, and parts of the monsters. If you bring 20 PDA's, then I'll give you information about caches. True, you could be lucky and find these stashes yourself, but then again you might not.
Agreed, if I find any PDA's I will bring them to you.
Hi, how's life, heard any rumours?
No, no rumours, get to the point, what have you had brought?
Here, I've brought you 10 PDA's.
I've had a rich day. Here's 20 PDA's.
As a matter of fact I don't have any PDA's, I'll bring them in due course.
For the 10 PDA's, then take this, as promised.
20 PDA's - they have much information! Give me your PDA and I will mark the position of the hidden cache.
Well then, until next time.
Borov, I want to buy something.
I have cartridges and weapons.
Cartridges.
Weapon.
What kind of ammo?
I have a Saiga and an AK-47.
Standard for the AK-47.
7.62x39mm, 3 packs for five cans of preserves.
Armour-piercing for the AK-47.
7.62x39mm armour-piercing, three packs for four bottles of vodka.
For the AK, standard.
5.45x39mm, 3 packs, for five loaves of bread.
For the AK, improved.
5.45x39mm BP, 3 packs for four bottles of vodka.
For LR -300, standard.
5.56x45mm SS109, three packs for five knobs of sausage.
For LR -300, improved.
5.56x45mm AP, three packs for four bottles of vodka.
For the SVD, standard.
7.62x54R of 7N1, three packs for a Stone Flower artefact.
For Vintorez, Shaft, and ThunderStorm, standard.
9x39 PUB-9, three packs for a Slime artefact.
Ak-47 for two Mica artifacts.
Saiga.
Saiga for two Meat Chunk artifacts.
AK-47 - my favourite weapon, come here.
It is somewhat expensive.
Saiga? All right, Snorks, beware! Here, take 2 Meat Chunks.
No, not today, I'm empty.
Come on, ya gotta have the usual.
I ate the canned food, I was hungry.
Do you have armour-piercing for the AK-47? Give.
Nope!
I need standard cartridges for the AK, I'm running out.
Nope, all gone.
Armour piercing? Come on.
Nope, we took a bit of a walk in the village yesterday.
I need cartridges for the LR -300.
All gone.
Armour-piercing NATO rounds? Come on.
I don't have any Vodka left - I drank it all with the guys.
Give it to me, I have a Stone Flower.
I don't have any Vodka left - I drank it all.
Ok, give me the ThunderStorm.
Do not have any today.
Good morning!
What has brought you to me, Stalker?
Lukash told me that you can show me how to get from the territory of the Military Warehouses to the Bar.

Yes I can show you the path to the Bar, but only if you me help. You arrived at an opportune time. There is an urgent matter here: after the Military warriors were repulsed they left some documents behind. Where they are now, who knows; but they're at the base that's for sure. If you could find them before Freedom ... I would like to see these documents before Lukash's people find them. Let's just say, for ethical reasons.
Do I understand you correctly? You want me to find some documents at the Freedom base.
Precisely! If you find documents for me, I will show you the way to the Bar.
How do you suggest I find these documents? There are so many of them and I might not live long enough to find them all. And I must continue on my journey.

Hold on, brother, don't get excited. This folder is special, I assure you. It's hidden, but not among other documents, (whispers in a very depressing voice), on the envelope should be written: Agents and Case Number. This folder is in a protective waterproof and fireproof transparent cover. So that it can lie anywhere, even outdoors. OK? I am very ... very willing to pay for them, Stalker. So apart from the transition to the Bar I will give you a recipe for transmutating artifacts.
Well it's in good hands. I'll find you the documents at the Freedom base, as it is necessary for me to get to the Military Warehouses.
Hello, I was at the base.
Well? Did you find anything?

Yes, I found them. Entertaining reading, I caught a glimpse of something very important to me in those documents ... I didn't just come here by accident - I am looking for my brother, for whom I've been searching for a long time. He's called 'Captain'. In the secret folder, I found mention of him. These notes are relatively new according the dates. You know anything about my brother?

You shouldn't have poked you nose in them. Oh well! And about your 'Captain': I think you've already found out - he recently joined the group Duty, as their guide, he is a seasoned Stalker now. The entire area, inside and out has benefited because of him. I hope you find him soon. I hope I've been of help.
This is the best news I've had since I entered the Zone! Thank you for the information about my brother. But where do I find this group called Duty?

As far as I know, Duty is now based in the Dark Valley. You have to go through the Bar to get there. It is true that you will have to go through the Garbage, but that is just a minor detail. I will note on your PDA the transition to the Bar as promised, and I will give you a recipe of transmutations, it is useful.
Thanks, hand it over.

Well, I'll give you some free valuable information. There lives in the Zone, in a tunnel at the Agroprom, a person called Sorcerer. He is engaged in black magic. The most interesting thing is that he can resurrect the dead. So if you need to bring back someone to life, then look for him at the Agroprom.
Well, thanks for the info! I hope I do not have to use the services of the Sorcerer's 'black magic'.
Can I do something else for you?
Yes you can, there's an emergency. Some guys, Diggers, got into trouble at the Radar. Someone robbed their cache, they are now without food or medicine.
What is required?

Well, in general, this is easy. What I gathered for them should be sufficient. Your task is to deliver the parcel. Here are their coordinates. At the same time I will show you the transition from the Military Warehouses to the Radar. It will come in handy later.

Ok give me the coordinates as I need to hurry. I'll go to the Radar and help out the guys on the way. I can search for artifacts. And I need to find Prince anyway. They say there are a lot of artifacts out there, such as the 'Klondike'. Oh, and then I'll to the Bar for a drink and relax a bit. Hopefully I can get acquainted with Duty and track down my brother.
Who are you?

It's better not to ask. All I saw was this damn Bloodsucker, a powerful one. Shot it with my revolver and didn't hurt it. Good that it was well fed. It didn't try to kill us, so no one was harmed. We could have been infected. The Zone takes what it wants. Ok Stalker, what you doing here?

Oh yeah, I nearly forgot, I'm here on behalf of Snitch, he has collected some things for you, he said the other day you were robbed. Well, here are a few items for you: food, med kits and Vodka. As for me, I'm searching the Zone for my brother, we were separated a long time ago, he's called 'Captain'. Have you heard anything about him or his team?

No, I'm sorry, I have not heard anything. But thank you, you saved us. How can we reward you? Wait there is something! We found weapons and cartridges in someone's cache. What would you prefer? NATO or ours?
I'll take NATO.
I'll take ours.
Well, I've wandered into another wilderness. Do you have a job for me?
How about hunting?
What, the marked bloodsucker, the one almost tore you to shreds?
It has a birthmark! Or are you chicken? I wish to make an effigy in memory of it.
No, I'm not afraid, where do I find it?
Here, it is close to us. I'll put a marker on your PDA. Kill the creature and drag the carcass to me.
Shit, that damn beast was hard to kill.
How did you handle it? I still do not understand.
Yeah, had to fuck with it. Okay, here is the carcass, take it.
Damn creature stinks of infection. Well as agreed, here is a med kit.
What's next?
I think we need to catch that bastard who stole our things from the cache.
How do we do that?

It's very simple. Look, I'll put a little swag in one of our caches, and you hide in the bushes close by. I'm sure the thief is one of us, so I will gather the men and tell them about the swag. The 'rat' among us, will probably go and steal again, and there ... I hope, it's up to you brother.
Sviblov, I will not fail you.

Only this, don't act prematurely. Wait until he comes to the stash, but then you never know, it could be just someone walking by. Don't be seen, the matter is delicate, and make sure you're not heard.
Greetings, Sviblov.
Oh, our saviour! By the way, what is your name?
I'm called Strelok.
So Strelok, so how's our deal?
Finished, everything is quiet now. However, Fyodor was the thief.

Oh, the devil, I also suspected him, but there was no evidence. Okay, thank you for your service. Yes, here is your reward, a silenced sniper rifle. The boys dug it up somewhere. I'll give you some ammo for it as well.
Thanks for the rifle! Oh, I took this off the neck of that thief Fyodor, it's some sort of ancient amulet, a very strange thing indeed. Here, look ... Do you have any idea what this thing is?

Yes a curious thing indeed... slightly radioactive, and obviously has some protective properties. You know what, show this Amulet to the stalker who is over there standing against the wall. He's recently returned from a raid. He should know what this thing is.
Okay, give the amulet to me and then I'll show it to him.
Well Sviblov if there's no more work I'll go.
Wait, there is something. I do have another job. I need you need to go down into the bunker and haul some stuff out from there. Just bring everything you can find in there.
Hmmm, it sounds a little vague. You need to be more specific.
We need a computer, and there may be some documents there as well. So bring them too.
Understood I'm on my way.
Well Sviblov I found the place! The monsters were like cockroaches.
They were very important documents. Did you find them?
Yes, here is the computer and documents.
You're good. I will give you a transmutation recipe. My guys removed this recipe from a Mercenary's PDA.
Lukash do you have any more work?
Work? No I don't have any as yet, but I do have a request.
What request?
I need you to find someone.
To kill or what?

You don't understand, there is a man - Lefty, a master of all trades. We recaptured the base, but there are still a lot of things to do - there are repairs to make, well, as you know. But he is not happy working for Duty.
Duty? Who are they?
Military types, with crazy ideas - 'to clear the zone'. Well, we don't agree with them. Find Lefty and persuade him to join us ... We need him.
Well, if I can find Lefty, I'll try and talk him into it.

Don't keep us waiting. You see, we are desperate. Oh, and here at the Military Warehouses, in the village near the abandoned checkpoint there's a person called Snitch. He's a murky type, you need to see him, but be careful. To exit from this territory, you need to know where the transition is. As far as I know you can get only from the Military Warehouses to the Bar, but only Snitch knows the way. So go see him.
Okay, I'll go have a talk with Snitch.
Hello, are you Lefty?
Yes, I am.
They say you're a jack of all trades.
Well, I can do much. What do you need?
I've been sent by someone who wants you to come to his base, to do sundry repairs. Well, generally, fix everything that you can.
No, I'm no longer at Voronin's beck and call. Subordination, discipline, brrr, well, I'd rather live on charity.
No, not by Voronin, by Lukash.

Ah, to be part of Freedom, but how can I go to them? Look at me all I have are castoffs, my weapon is worn, and it's a long way to go. I'll tell you what, get me a new weapon, a Groza, and a new suit, something better than a Seva, maybe a Scientific Mercenary Outfit. And then I'll consider it, agreed?
Oh damn it, how did I get into this? Well agreed, I will find you a new Scientific Mercenary Outfit and Groza.
Well, Lefty, regards.
And to you regards. Well, did you find the new acquisitions for me?
Yes, I found everything. Here take them, as you requested the Scientific Mercenary Outfit and the Groza. All in excellent condition.
Oh, man, thank you! If you need something repaired at once you can contact me.
Okay, agreed. Good luck!
Regards, Lukash.
Oh, Strelok, come in, what's new?
I found Lefty. He, of course, was a little stubborn, but eventually agreed. So he awaits his guests.
As always, you didn't disappoint me, thank you. I owe you one. Oh, by the way, I need you to visit Skinflint as he has a serious problem.
Okay, I will go see Skinflint.
Is there something I can do for you?
Brother, I need help.
Ok please explain. What is the problem?
Some friends of mine were captured by Bandits, and were put in a local prison.
Where is this prison?
Well, like yeah, they just converted an old bunker into a jail and all those captured, are held there.
Well, how can I help? Can you pay me or give me something?

The local big shot Duke won't speak to me since he captured my guys, and he is a big dude. But he might talk to you. Persuade Duke to release my guys. And I ... and I'll give a recipe for a transmutation.
Agreed, I will have a talk with Duke, but I promise nothing.
Hello, friend.
Hello, Stalker. Where are you from? What do you want here?
I've came here to do business with you, so I have no time to waste.
Ok stalker what business do you have?
I've heard that you're holding a couple of Stalkers in jail because they owe a debt.
Soooo, Sahat has sent you, shit! He drives me crazy, he should be thrown out of the Zone, everyone is pissed with him.
Well, so what about the boys?

Yeah the shameful bitches, they stole my unique Winchester 12 shotgun, the one Lefty gave me for my birthday. I killed a pseudogiant with it ... but these rats. What happened was before I had a shower in the Bar, I placed the weapon in the rack because I knew that no one would touch it there. Then I went to the recreation room. I had a few hours sleep, and went back to the bar, there were only a couple of guys there, and Borov. I looked at the rack, and my weapon was gone. Well naturally I assumed this and that, but with a solid punch, Borov interfered. It turned out eventually that these two bastards had shortly left the bar. Well my training had paid off, I took off in pursuit and caught them. All they saw was one ugly looking gangster who ran out of the bar like a bullet and knocked them down. These guys wouldn't admit to the crime: "Who us? No, never Duke! We respect you and we value our lives too much.", and all that usual bullshit. Well, I had them placed in the slammer. I told them that if they didn't confess, and return the weapon plus a penalty, they could rot in there forever.
If I find the weapon will you let the guys go?
The weapon and a penalty, let's say 15,000 rubles.
Ten thousand and the gun, that's all I can afford.
Okay, I agree friend. I hope you keep your word. Yes, you have to impress Sahat. He basically is sly, clearly not all that you claim.
Well, do you want me to help you?
Of course, why would I ask you then?
Well then, cut out all the bullshit and tell me what happened.

I understand someone swiped Duke's Winchester and Cat was in the bar at approximately the same time. Well now everyone is thinking it was him. Moreover everyone knows that Cat is an avid gambler and always loses constantly. Admit it, with such a reputation is not difficult to point the finger? But it wasn't him.
Then who?
The boys, when they came into the bar, bumped into a guy and nearly knocked him over. They think it was him.
Well where should I look for this guy they bumped into?

Here's what I can tell you: when Cat was in the Bar prison with two others, I overheard him talking to a guy from the Bandit gang, his nickname was Walnut. He and two others, inexperienced Stalkers, went to get a very rare and valuable artefact. It was somewhere in a secluded area, a strange phenomenon had happened and all the known anomalies were in one place for three days, and formed a monstrous raging haze. During this time they spotted about a dozen of the rarest artifacts. They were all located in this same mess. Exactly where this place is, I didn't hear. But it is somewhere in the Dark Valley. The artifacts that were formed there disappeared into the ground. You would have to be lucky to find them. So these three decided to hit the jackpot and went there. But the place had so many monsters - Mama Mia! Well, the two inexperienced Stalkers pissed their pants and ran away. Walnut saw an artefact, so he jumped off the roof to get one, but the wind blew strongly and chimeras appeared. Well, he also then ran like hell. He ran for a long time but still could not get away ... he was wounded severely.
Why did you keep silent?
I didn't keep silent, no one here wanted to listen to me.
So, okay, it's clear. You better tell me, where I can look for Duke's shotgun?

Okay, don't get pissed! I think that the Winchester is near Walnut's body. Where he was killed by a chimera. After all, beasts don't need guns ... The Bandits said this all took place in the Dark Valley. The two that ran away were near a small two-story building, which is at the gas station next to the unfinished factory. In it, Walnut tried to shelter, but no luck, you see ... There, in the house at a gas station, I'd look for it.
Well, Duke, I found your Winchester.
And money, did you bring any?
Yes, I have the money.
No, there is no money.
Well done, but this is not what I expected, shit! You greased me, brother! All right, I'll tell my guys to release these two freaks.
Well are you satisfied? I found Duke's shotgun.
Thank you, that helped. And the guys, are they released?
Yes, Duke has already released them.
Well, I... Well, I'll... Write down the recipe, thanks to you again.
Anything I can do for you?

Man, we need your help. Our brother, Lefty, was captured by Mercenaries. The guys are concerned because there are only a few of us left, each weapon is important. Help us out, brother, come with us. Please don't resent our comrade.
Oh, Lefty! Yes, I need him.
Follow us.
Understood.
Bes do you have any cartridges??
I can give you some for the AK.
Well give them up. Then I can kick butt.
What's going on here?

Bandits, they are looters and scum. We have declared a war on them here, almost cleaned them all out of the Dark Valley, but it did not last long, well now they are in revenge and decided to attack us all at once. Okay, we'll show them who's boss.
I see. You haven't really chosen a good place for the base.
Well, our clan is relatively young. Our forces have gathered and are waiting for us at the Bar. It's time to expel the Bandits again.
It'll be rather difficult for you have. Painfully, they are well entrenched.
Give us time and we'll get there. I, General Voronin, make this promise to you. By the way, thanks for the help. Here, take this from me, it'll come in handy.
Hello, Comrade Colonel.
Hello, Stalker, Is there something I can do for you?
Well, I need to buy something.
I have cartridges, med kits and weapons.
Cartridges.
Weapon.
Med kits.
What cartridges?
What weapon?
Military.
Cartridges, armour-piercing, 5.45x39mm BP.
3 packs for a jellyfish artifact.
I have a Jellyfish, take it.
Agreed.
Cartridges, sniper, 7.62x54R for 7N1.
3 packs - for a Meat Chunk artifact.
Give me that sniper rifle you have in your rucksack.
No, I don't have any.
Cartridges, armour-piercing, 7.62x54R for 7N14.
3 packs - for a Flash artefact.
Give me armour-piercing - this for that.
No I don't have a Flash.
Cartridges, sniper, 9x39 CP-5.
3 packs - for a Gravi artefact.
Come then, for the Thunderstorm.
Will you take a Gravi?
Cartridges, 9x39 CP-6, armour-piercing.
3 packs - for 2 Sparkler artifacts.
Yes, I have 2 Sparkler artifacts.
No thanks.
An-94 Abakan Sniper.
An-94 Abakan Sniper - for 2 Gravi artifacts.
Okay, I have 2 Gravi artifacts.
No thanks.
Assault rifle, Abakan.
Assault rifle, Abakan - for 2 Sea Urchin artifacts.
Okay, I have 2 Sea Urchin"artifacts.
Prices!!! Prices!!! I think I'll stick with the AK.
Noiseless modified sniper rifle SVU.
Noiseless modified sniper rifle SVU - for 2 Ruby Spring artifacts.
Ok, I have two Ruby Spring artifacts.
Never mind, I don't need it.
VSS Vintorez.
VSS Vintorez - for 2 Ruby Spring artifacts.
Give, I have a couple of Ruby Spring artifacts.
No, I don't need one...
RPG-7V.
RPG-7V - for two Stone Flower artifacts.
Give, I have a couple of Stone Flowe artifacts.
It is somewhat expensive.
Army or what?
Army med kit - for one Slug artefact.
Give, I have one Slug artefact.
It is somewhat expensive.
Is there work, Duke?
Well friend aren't you afraid to work with us? You understand, we work on special tasks.
I understand, come out with it.
Here's your task, it's simple, there is a loser they call Jeka, he owes me money, just shameful. He's hanging out in the Garbage.
What should I do?
Two options: either to get the dough from this son of a bitch, or, ah, you know...
Okay, I will have a talk with him.
Are you Jeka?
Yes, how can I help you?
Duke sent me. Guess what we are going to talk about?!

He's spoken to me before. I asked to him wait a bit, as things have been slow around here, but hopefully, they are about to get better. The Garbage is practically empty of artifacts, so basically we sit around with nothing to do.
This response will not satisfy Duke.
What do you want to do, kill me?! I have no money. Listen, there is another option.
What do you mean?
I can suggest one thing ... it is a map, if it's analysed, you can find the location of Semetsky's cache.
That is bullshit. Are you offering me this piece of paper?

No, I know what I'm saying. An old Digger gave it to me while we sheltered from an emission, I don't remember his name, I survived but he ... he told me that he and Semetsky had met earlier near the Sarcophagus, and they had formed a group of eight, plus Semetsky, who then went to them. He told them he was going on a journey and may not return, lastly he took out a map where his cache was marked. He divided this map into eight parts and gave one to each of the guys. Why, I do not know.
And what you do propose?
Well, I'll give you this map fragment if you have my debt cleared.
Surely you're lying. Ah ok, give me the piece of the map.
No, brother, I know better!
Regards, Duke.
Are you healthy and happy?
Yes I am. This Jeka, I tried to reason with him. It was necessary to shoot him. He won't put himself in any more debt now.
Oh, I figured that guy wouldn't make it. People were getting fed up with him. Anyway, here take this
Regards Duke.
Well did you have any success with Jeka?
Yes, he paid after I threatened him.
Well then give me the money.
Here take it.
Damn I lost my wallet in Garbage. I searched all over the place.
Well done friend! Good work! And here's a little gift for your troubles.
Any work Duke? By the way I'm Strelok. You remember.

There is one thing Strelok, this task should be easy, then again it maybe not. We were to receive a delivery of a bag of 'grass', you know, the puff the magic dragon kind. The problem was an emission. The damn Zone was not being hospitable. The helicopter nearly crashed because the turbulence was so bad the pilots lost control of the heli and jettisoned the bag somewhere in the vacinity a small water tower before they crashed. I sent a colleague to search the area, but he found jack shit. So consider that tower somewhat of a reference point.
You have a weak reference point, so how many kilometres do I have to crawl on my belly?
Yes I see your dilemma. Listen you go back to the nerds in Yantar. I'm sure they can help you. Just ask those egg-heads to put a label on your PDA where you can find this bag of 'grass'.
Okay, let's see... I gotta find it. So I need to go to the scientists in Yantar.
Greetings sir!
Hello, Stalker. Are you hiding from mutants or are you here on business?
Basically on business.
Well, out with it.
Yes, I need a PDA marker for something.
What kind of thing? Speak clearly.
A bag of grass, marijuana probably. Maybe it's Columbian.
Wow, a valuable commodity!! We don't often get requests for such stuff. We can find it, no problem. But you understand there is a price.
How much?
Two Fireball artifacts.
Expensive of course, but oh well.
The price is too steep, I'll find it myself.
Hello Duke!
Cough it up, friend.
Here keep it! The bag is heavy and it's slightly water-logged. How it get wet I don't know.
Let it dry, no big deal! You work efficiently. I need to learn from you. Anyway, I have a proposition for you if you're interested.
Any way I can help you?
I see you are a hard working guy. Do you do not want make some money?
Hell yeah. What do you propose?
Well there is a way to make good money, but it's risky.
What exactly do you mean? What kind of work? Not macabre, is it?
Well there's this guy named Varangian, you can find him in the underground in the Agroprom. He has a game that pays well, but there is a catch.
What's the 'but' mean?
The problem is that no one has ever won, not once. Losing is death.
Sounds like fun. Well, I'll think about it. Maybe I'll check it out.
Varangian, right?
Yes, that's me. Have you decided to test yourself by going through the mutant gauntlet?
Well sort of.

Do you know the rules? No? I'll tell you. It is necessary to run four laps. Each lap will be increasingly more difficult and the mutants more insidious. If you finish all four consecutive laps you'll receive a reward: a recipe for transmutation, and a weapon - an M16 rifle. Remember! Until you complete all four laps it is not possible to leave the basements of the Agroprom, and you must surrender your weapons before you start. Only a knife is permitted, so you can't take anything else. You have to run to the end. When you get there you'll find a med kit and/or bandages. I hope you make it. After you get there I will give a signal when to return.
Understood!
Well are you ready?
Yep, I'm one badass stalker.

Give me your stuff. Remember you have to run all the way to the end. There will be med kits and bandages there for you. When you come back and I will have more med kits and bandages. And for each lap you will get less.
Ok take everything.
Yes, like man, the truth is, these Zombies are bitches, very tenacious.
You're wounded, here take a med kit.
Thanks.
Well, the first round is over.
Yes I know, I'm here ain't I.
Well it's time for the second round.
Wish me luck.
The laps are more difficult now.
Take this med kit.
Thanks again.
Well, are you ready?
Ah, let me catch my breath ... ok I am ready.
Those damn bloodsuckers. I hate those creatures! I was almost torn into pieces.
Yeah it's best to avoid them, especially without a good weapon.
Anyway it's the last round.
Yes, you are right. Here take a med kit.
All right, I'm leaving.
Hurray I made it!!
You sure did, I didn't expect you to make it through. Well done! You are the only stalker that survived.
Okay, give back my things. I should eat something too.
Ok, here is your shit dude. And here is your prize and another recipe for a transmutation.
Thanks, and for the recipe especially. I taught those Burers some humility.
Damn Varangian, I did not succeed.
Here's your stuff, get out of here you meathead.
What do you want, brother?

Listen brother, I have two unique Mercenary weapons - M16's with an integrated optical sight. It is difficult to find cartridges for them. Perhaps some Duty guys would be interested. Take these guns, and in return I ask for cartridges, but only for the AK.
Well, I'm not really going that way...
Come on brother, help me, I will be indebted to you. I also throw in some odds and ends.
Ok, I'm persuaded, give them here.
Hello Colonel.
Oh, Strelok? What brings you here?
Here I brought to you something.
Oh, M16's modified as sniper rifles? Where did you get them?
Bes got them from two Mercenaries that where killed. He requests cartridges for the AK.
The rifles are intriguing and worth money. Okay I will not detain you, here take the ammo. Say hi to Bes for me. A good man, sorry that he is no longer with us.
Hello Bes. Petrenko sends his regards and wishes you were still with them.
Well Strelok, I cannot go back to them. They have their ethics and I have mine, theirs is not to my liking.
Agreed brother, here are the cartridges, as promised.
Thank you, and I have something for you.
