Hello Professor.
Welcome young man, what do you need of me?
Yes, I came to purchase something. I will work for food.
Hmmm ... Okay, but can you handle tough tasks?
I'll try, Professor, I'm capable.

Well, here's your assignment: we found several species of monsters that have surprised us with their abilities, namely, they regenerate very fast. We are very interested in why and how this mutation occurs, and need to observe them. To do this, they need to be tagged.
You're joking, right?! Where are they now and how would I tag them? It's not likely they'd cooperate.

A Pseudogiant was last seen in Rostok near where a helicopter has crashed. A Bald Chimera can be found in the Dark Valley, you know near the abandoned factory where the Bandits occasionally hang out, behind it is a small swamp, right by the fence, where the sewers discharge, Understand?! A bloodsucker lives in the Cordon at the abandoned pig farms near the destroyed trestle bridge. Now on how to hang the tags, I'll give you a special Protecta weapon, it's been converted by one of our craftsmen. It fires a special-cartridge, which when contacting the body of a target will apply a tag without causing any harm. Thus you will be able to hang a tag on all three mutants. And don't forget to return this shotgun, you can't kill anything with it, and we still need it. If everything goes to plan I will mark on your PDA some useful information about the transition from Yantar to Radar and back. Obviously these experiments with mutants must be done while they are alive.
Professor, I've returned.
You managed the mission well, Strelok, I did not expect it, to be honest.
I told you, Doc. that I was capable. Although, I had to run my arse off.
Well give me the shotgun and I will mark the transition from Yantar to the Radar on your PDA.
Well Doctor do you have any more work?

There is one very delicate matter. One of our researchers, Associate Professor Dorodina, betrayed us by stealing a very rare artefact. He sold it to a corrupt customer on the 'Mainland'. It earned him a lot of money, which he then deposited to a bank account. Then he arranged with three soldiers to him get out of the Zone. Along with him went another scientist, his assistant, who has very valuable data which could earn him a considerable amount of money on the 'Mainland'. His memory is phenomenal, all the information is in his head, without that brain power neither Dorodina nor anyone else would associate with him.
So, what do you need me to do?

For his treachery he should be punished severely! Eliminate Dorodina, period. With his assistant, do what you consider necessary, so that he is no longer a threat to us, but he should be punished as well.
The Military and I have crossed paths before, and they won't be happy to see me.
I'll give you the mission to eliminate Dorodina and Dan has all the details. It seems everything is already planned out. After all he is our head of Security.
Hi Dan. The Professor said that you know what is going on and will explain everything to me.

Regards, Strelok! I see Sakharov briefly told you about the treachery Of Dorodina and his assistant. We tracked their movements and these two are still in the Zone. They are in the Dark Valley under the protection of three corrupt soldiers. They are waiting for a helicopter to take them out of the Zone. You should find them and eliminate them. Dorodina must be terminated - it's your primary objective. The second guy, the traitor, should also be shot. That's just the way it is.
Understood. So, how am I to do this?

You're familiar with Lab X-18 in the Dark Valley aren't you? On the right is a hilly field with a lot of anomalies and mutants. There is a fence near the edge of it. I will put a marker on your PDA. Anyway, these three soldiers who guard the traitors are clearly specialists. You really don't have to deal with them, just the traitors. Get on the roof of the X-18 complex, there is a great sniping spot there. You will have to move quietly and quickly to get on the roof. And remember your main goal - the elimination of Dorodina. He should be terminated quietly and most importantly, don't let the soldiers see you, otherwise the mission might fail. The two scientists are wearing the same green Research Suits, that will help you indentify them - once in position, bring them both down with a bullet. Once you kill both of these traitors, the soldiers should be peaceful. I'll be in touch. Read the messages from me...
Dan, do you have a sniper's rifle?
I can give you an American M14 sniper rifle and 30 sniper cartridges for it.
How much?
Not much, just 4 Fireball artifacts.
Here, take them.
I don't have any.
Professor, good day.
Come in, Strelok, you have completed the job. I am pleased with your cooperation.
Nice to hear. Hopefully this will be reflected somehow in my reputation. Right?

You know, I've been thinking that you still have time to earn some weapons and ammo. I will give you more valuable information and a couple of recipes for transmuting artifacts. Give me your PDA and I will load the information about the transition from the Agroprom to Yantar and vice versa. Oh, and again your help is needed. We have a person missing. Kruglov has the information, talk to him please.
Ok I will go talk with Kruglov.
Professor do you have anything for sale?
Cartridges, med kits, weapons.
How much for the cartridges?
How much for weapons?
How much for med kits?

For the ammo I've got: 
 1) "7.62x51 mm NATO" - 2 packs of three Droplets artifacts, 
 2) "7.62x51 mm NATO PSU" - 2 packs for 2 Fireball artifacts, 
 3) "12.7x99 mm" for the WA-2000 sniper rifle - 2 packs for one Pellicle artefact.

These are the NATO sniper rifles: 
 1) GALATZ - for - one Soul artefact, 
 2) The SR-25 rifle - for a Crystal artefact, 
 3) HK 417 Automatic Rifle - for a Moonlight artefact, 
 4) Occasional WA-2000 sniper rifle - for 10 Poltergeist Eyes.
Scientific med kits - 3 for 10 Cat Tails, or antirads - 2 for 10 Burer Hands.
Give me 7.62x51mm NATO I have 3 Droplets artifacts.
Give me 7.62x51mm NATO PSU, I love armour-piercing cartridges.
Give me 12.7x99mm for the WA-2000 sniper rifle.
No, professor, nothing today.
Give me the Galatz, if you have cartridges for it.
Give me the automatic SR-25, I'll test that beast.
Automatic rifle HK 417? Well, I'll try it out.
WA-2000 Sniper rifle - my dream, I take without looking.
Scientific med kits are necessary, I'll take some.
I'll take the antirads, otherwise my missions might fail. My nuts already itch.
I met with 'Captain'. He is not my brother ... my mistake.
It's a shame, I sympathize with you.
General, Captain Sobolev said that you can show me the path to the Cordon from the Dark Valley.

Well we might know after a while. I sent a Scout to the factory where the Bandits are entrenched. There, he can obtain information about where they store their data about transitions from the Dark Valley. In the meantime you can help us.
It is agreeable, General, I will wait. How I can you help?
I can see that you can handle weapons, so I think there is a job for you.
What should I do?

Recently a lot of different mutants have bred near the X-18 Laboratory. This area around X-18 must be cleared of all mutants. The Scientists have long asked for this, but somehow we never got around to doing it.
Roger that General. I am on my way.
General, may I report?
Greetings to you, Strelok. Are you kidding? Okay, what's with the mission?
Task completed, the area is clear, the way into the lab is safe.
Good for you, and here is the reward.
Well how about the transition to the Cordon, General?

Listen Strelok, according to our data, somewhere in the abandoned factory in the Dark Valley there is a bandit stash. If you find it, take everything. We suffered quite a serious blow from a local gang of bandits. In this stash, there are many weapons and there's a flash drive or disk with information about the transition to the Cordon.
General, that's a big plant, looking there for a bandit stash without exact coordinates is like looking for a needle in a haystack.
I understand, but if everything was so simple, we would have found it ourselves. I can tell you there is a man, a Bandit called Vein, find him, and he can help you to find the stash.
Isn't it strange, a Bandit will help me to rob their own?
He has some kind of deal with the bandit leaders apparently, so I think that if you talk to him nicely he would help. By the way, he once gave useful information to one of my scouts.
Where do I find this Vein?
It is necessary to search somewhere near the factory, exactly where I cannot say. He hides from everyone.
Hello, are you the bandit called Vein?
Well I suppose I am, what you want?
Well if you are Vein, then I must speak with you.
What do you need to speak to me about friend?
You possess certain information which I need. Do you know where the Bandit stash is?
Ah, so that's it? Why the fuck should I tell you?

To put it bluntly: I can affect you health, others you do not have to worry about. And here I can be your saviour. Will you help me? I will put in a good word for you to Voronin that we have a deal on the basis of trust.

Ok friend, let's do a deal: first you negotiate with General Voronin and then I will tell you about the stash. You may hold the most of trump cards, but I still have one. If I tell you about the stash now, then I will no longer be useful.
Fine, wait for me, I will return soon.
General!
What's up, Strelok?
I found the Bandit, he agrees to reveal the location of the stash. But he ... He wants your protection and to be allowed back onto the base.
Why would I want any Bandit rabble here? The guy's stuff would begin to vanish. I know these criminals, only the grave will stop them.

General Voronin, he's not a thief, he's a former Paratrooper, he was just unlucky. He went to prison, and there he learnt about the Zone. After his release he had now where else to go. Because your group doesn't accept ex-cons, you rejected him and only the Bandits would take him in. He's a good guy, I can vouch for him.
Well, if you vouch for him then give him this warning. Steal, and he is up against the wall.
Regards, Vein.
Hello.
All right, Voronin agreed, you can move to the base. I fulfilled my part of the contract so now it's your turn.

Listen up me. The stash is on the roof of the main part of the former factory. You will need to climb to the roof. You'll be going over some wooden plants toward a window. I'll mark your PDA. It will help you find it quickly.
Here, General, take - all that I've found.
Good stuff, weapons and many rounds of ammunition. You can equip a small army.
There's still that flash drive you spoke about.
That's fine! Well, the Bandits won't 'be happy' when they discover that their stash is empty. Here, take it, you earned it. So, let's see what's on a flash drive. Wait a minute...
Well, what is it?
There is data about the transition. I'll mark your PDA with the transition from the Dark Valley to the Cordon and back.
Well, that's good. Now I can go to the Cordon.
Is there something you wish to say?
I want to ask you about something. By the way, what's your name?
I'm Strelok. What do you want to ask?
I have a portable radio, take it to Zahar. I want him to have constant communication. The instructions are inside. I think he will understand them. Tell him I am no longer mad at him.
It's far away, but yes, I have the time - I will deliver it.
Zahar, hello.
Hello, Strelok! Did you decide to visit again? Did you find your brother?

No, I haven't found my brother yet, but I found your friend Captain Sobolev, he works with Duty now. He asked me to tell you he doesn't hold any grudges. Here, he has sent you this portable radio unit for keeping in contact with him. Instructions are inside.
Thank you, Strelok! You brought an old man good news. Take this - here a little buckshot, as a thank you from me.
Don't mention it, Zahar. Today I helped you - tomorrow you me. Since we live in this damn Zone, so it...
Can I help with something else?
Um, well there is one little matter in which you can help.
So, fill me in.

Yes, the last time I used the transition to the Military Warehouses and back to our camp was to collect a few artifacts. As I passed near a small swamp, in the northern part of the Forest, I ran into a pack of pseudo-dogs. They chased me into the swamp, I barely escaped these creatures. But the thing is, I dropped the container with the collected artifacts, somewhere in the swamp. I did not have time to search for it and had to run quickly back to camp as it was getting dark. Thank God I managed to get back before nightfall. My feet still hurt.
I understand that you want me to go to the swamp and find your container with the artifacts?
Yes, it would be good if you could help me. I would be indebted to you. I'll have to mark the spot on your PDA. However, you will have to search in the water...
Well, Zahar, point out the place to search and I will try to help you.
Zahar, I found your container in the swamp.
Well, thank you, Strelok
The swamp was heavy with creatures, they were almost the death of me, but I managed.
Yes Strelok, the mutants in the Forest have multiplied. I haven't had time to shoot them yet. Well, give me the container, and here's something I've prepared for you.
Here, take your container and don't lose it!
Regards, Dan.
Long time no see. But we have a Zombie problem, you understand, every day more and more of our comrades fall. Listen up; this is what I think...
What?

At the plant at Yantar, there are many monsters and zombies ... Ufff ... And this scum is out every night, howls, moans, screams and growls, for a whole week I couldn't sleep. This is what I propose: it is necessary to clean out the territory. Are you interested?
That task is not easy. Does it pay well?
To be honest it doesn't pay much. But I do have a grenade launcher and charges for it, here take them and make good use of them.
Hello, Dan. Well I killed off all the mutants.
Yeah, heard weapons firing and screaming ... Finally I can get some sleep.
Do you want the grenade launcher back?
No, keep it as a reward, and I'll throw in some more cartridges.
Is there something I can do for you?

My friend, help me out, Tolik has sent an SOS, but I cannot leave my post, Wolf has put me here. Lately we've have a problem with the Bandits. Well, get to the camp and then Wolf will explain everything. But don't go into the village because there are Bandits there. Without someone as experienced as Wolf, who would protect the camp? The Rookies, they've scattered, it's understandable. Anyway I have been talking too much and Tolik needs your help.
And where do I find him?
Tolik is somewhere near the transition to the Garbage. So go there and find him. Hurry brother and watch out for mutants. God forbid if something happens to him!
Okay I'll go find Tolik.
Hey, are you Tolik?
Oh brother, I'm fucked.
Well, you don't look so bad. The main thing is you are still alive.

Brother, help, help me get to the camp. Wolf will thank you. I'm afraid I'll not get there because I have double vision right now. Wow, I was fighting a bloodsucker. Then a couple of wild boars appeared and it went after them. I was sure lucky.
Well brother come on, let's go before it comes back
Are you in charge?
Yes I am. They call me Wolf. Thanks for helping Tolik get here.
No problem, I don't mind helping Stalkers. Most wouldn't.
True, brother, not everyone would rush to help others. Some would only help for weapons or artifacts. I have some something for, accept a little gift, and dont be offended.
Petruha told me about the Bandits.

Oh, yeah ... Shit happens: Barkeep sent me to the Agroprom, and I took the more experienced guys with me. All that was left in the village was Fanatic and some Rookies. Well, the Bandits took advantage of this and came, they shot half, and the other half - scattered. Fanatic was always drunk - he needs to drink less. When he dozed off, even the sound of gunfire couldn't wake him.
Why haven't you tried to recapture it?
We are outnumbered by 2 or 3 to 1, and our guys are Rookies.
Well, can I help you?

Well, it is evident that you are an experienced Stalker! Of course you can help. Our chances are better with your help to expel these Bandits. We could still use some more experienced Stalkers though. Listen up, you could go help a small group of Stalkers, they have been delayed on the road, they said they fear the mutants, and they do not want to move. They are camped not far from here. If you help them they can get here faster, then in no time we could clear the village of all Bandits.
Yes I'll go help them, are you coming?
Haven't you heard?
No, about what?
These mutants have multiplied. It is now too dangerous. No brother I will not go with you, it is too risky.
Okay, I'll go alone, tell me where?
Well, if you're not afraid, then listen, I can put a label on your PDA. When you find there Stalkers persuade them to join us. If they agree, lead them here. Then we can try to recapture the village.
Understood. I'm going.
Hello Stalker! Are you looking for Wolf?
Yes, we are. Only, we fear to go any further ... There were five of us, but mutants tore apart two, so it was necessary to harbour here.
Got it. I'm here to escort you to Wolf. Don't be afraid, you can move quickly with me. If anything, I'll cover you. Deal?
It's a deal. Great. To be honest, we are very tired and afraid all the time now. Finally, we're pissed off. Come, lead us.
Well, let's get going. No one lags behind.
Wolf, here's your PDA.
Well thank you! All right, now give the guys some weapons.
Okay, I'll do it straight away.
Shalom!
Here, take this weapon and ammunition.
Thank you, now I can kick some Bandit's butt!
Bonjour!
Here, take this weapon and ammunition.
Thanks, this is better than my PM.
Hello!
Here, take this weapon and ammunition.
Thank you.
Hi!
Here, take this weapon and ammunition.
Well, all the Bandits will have to answer to me.
Hey!
Here, take this weapon and ammunition.
Give them to me, they will be very useful.
Regards.
Here, take this weapon and ammunition.
Nice, I was getting tired of running all the time.
Well, Wolf, I've brought you the guys.

I see, well done; now we can act. Oh, the Bandits will be overwhelmed. I want you to lead, as I'm not very experienced, so the main task will rest on your shoulders. Don't get to far ahead, stay with me until reach the village, and then act on the situation.
Got it, it's not the first time. How do we advance?
Stay close to me, so we can cover the Rookies, so that they won't flee.
Well Wolf, we can rejoice, the village is ours.
Yes brother, thanks to you.
Hey, why didn't the Bandits attack Barkeep?

Barkeep? Well I'll tell you, that sly old fox seems to wiggle out of trouble, and who will touch him with his connections? Bandits too, need to eat and drink and buy weapons. Many of them pass through here.
Well Wolf, come on, I need to see Barkeep.
I have a transmutation recipe for you that will come in handy.
Hello Duke! Got any work?
Oh, some people! There is here one thing Strelok. Some of my guys are going to meet with some 'Chekhovians'.
And who are these 'Chekhovians'?
Just riff-raff, lawless morons basically. They work for Stone Blood artifacts. They are brainless piss-ants. Blah ... they are useless. It is necessary to consider them freaks.
Well, so what is the problem?

The problem is that I don't believe their bullshit. We agreed that the meeting will be held without weapons. Yeah right! In any event, there will be an old pal of mine there named Cross. I fear for his life. It is necessary to protect him, just in case the situation gets out of control.
Where will the meeting take place?

At the Garbage near the transition to the Dark Valley. Do not let them see you. 'Chekhovians' are nervous, yet they have amassed many enemies. If they get spooked they will start shooting immediately. There is a ruined building nearby. That's where you can climb up to and oversee what transpires. If everything is okay they will disperse peacefully with weapons holstered, but if all hell breaks loose don't leave these cretins alive, and remember Cross must survive. Wait for my signal before you start shooting and don't be seen. Sit still and wait. I know what you're like with a gun in your hands.
Hello Duke.
Well, if it isn't Strelok. I hear you handled the situation skillfully.
Yes, I almost fell asleep thinking that everything in the world was at peace. And then your message.
Okay in respect for Cross here take this for clearing out a small mob of 'Chekhovians'.
Hello Professor.
And hello to you Strelok. Do not want to earn some money?
What do you need done?
We have discovered a new artifact, until now it was unknown to. It's called the Heart of the Controller. We need you procure one for us.
Where can I find this artifact? This is the first time I have heard of it.

There is only one place and that is in the Agroprom. There in a small swamp with a trailer in the middle of it. Someone said it was there. But beware this artifact has a strange property. It emits telepathic waves which greatly suppresses brain activity. Furthermore, to discover it is only possible by using a special instrument which needs to be worn on your belt.
What kind of device? Where can I get it?
I'll give you the device, it's unique, if you hang it on your belt, and you will be able to find the Heart of the Controller artifact. Without it, you won't succeed.
Okay, give me the instrument and I will hang it on my belt. I will try to find this artefact.
Regards Professor, well, about that job you gave me.
Hard was it?
There was a Controller, I had to get tough.

This artifact attracts Controllers, why - is not yet known, but there is something that draws them to it. Anyway, here's what I suggest, you give me back my instrument and I'll pay a reward for the Heart of the Controller artefact, or you can keep this device as a reward and with it you can seek out more artifacts and return them to me. I'll pay you for each artefact you find. Without this device you will not find them, that's for sure. Yes, I will pay for rare artifacts, but not broken ones! Think about it.
No brother, pay me now for work and you take back your instrument.
Okay, I'll take the instrument, it will prove useful.
Hi, Kruglov, I've changed my mind.
What are you talking about?
I want to take your device, because you say you will not pay for a bad Heart of the Controller artifact, and without it I can't find any.
I can give you one, but not for free.
What you do want for it?
Necklaces Ladies Burer.
Yikes, expensive, but oh well, keep it.
I don't have one ... I'll bring one later.
I have a standard anomaly detector. Do you have a better one, by any chance?
Yes, I can exchange one for artifacts.
Is there something I can do for you?
One artefact, Heart of the Controller. I'll exchange it for an Elite Detector.
I'll take the detector.
I'm going to look for one.
Hello Kruglov.
And to you, Strelok, hello! What did you bring?
I brought the artefact, Heart of the Controller.
You've done well ... A rare artefact indeed. Here is your reward.
Hello, I need to talk to you.
About what?
Do you deal in information?
I do, if it's any good.
I have some map fragments; if I had all the pieces I could put all them together to show the location of Semetsky's cache.
Well?
Well, I searched the entire area, but some parts cannot be found. Can you help determine the coordinates of his cache?
There is one person, but you understand....
What is required?
An artefact, a Bengal Crystal Soul.
Wow, costly! Well I guess I will go look for one.
You search for it, and I will come up with something, I need to think.
Hello Snitch, I've not come back empty-handed!
What did you bring?
Here, take this artifact, Bengal Crystal Soul.
Good, give it here.
Well, what happened to our deal?
Had to work it out. The information that you provided, was not enough, but still...
What do you mean? Youre being vague.
Oh, don't get flushed! Don't worry everything is fine. Let me put the coordinates of the cache on your PDA.
Okay.
I have information about the transition from the Radar to the Dark Valley and back.
What do you want for it?
Two artifacts, Tears of the Chimera.
Here take them, I cooked two this morning.
So, we need 2 Droplets, based on them we obtain 2 Tears of Fire, and then ... Remember to cook them.
Well, hello, Barkeep.
Hello Strelok, I've been waiting for you.
Oh, you know me?

I remember stuff. I know many, if not all Stalkers. Well, okay, let's get to the point. I know you are looking for your brother. He came to me - he was good. I don't know where he is right now. Maybe sometime later I can help you.
Yes you really are the centre of information. No wonder Stalkers speak about you knowing everything.

Strelok, skip the compliments; you've must find Mahomet, right? Yes, that's right, I know. Mahomet is an experienced Digger-Loner, an X-Jihadist, and he irritates the hell out of Sidorovich who is a trader and who holds an important position in the Peacekeepers Corps. So you have to see Sidorovich. He will tell you where to find Mahomet. I too need to talk to him, but I cannot contact him now because after the last emission the Zone has expanded into large parts of the Peacekeeper's area, and there is something strange going on with communications. I also have news to send to Sidorovich, understand? So we have a common interest.
And what do you propose?
I'll have to think about it, I will consult with some Stalkers in the Peacekeeping Corps territory; until I solve this, go help some good people.
But who are these 'good people', and how do I help them?
You know them - Fang, Ghost, Feldsher... Should I continue?
Yeah, they're all familiar to me ... What do they need from me?

You understand, many do not believe in the extraterrestrial origin of the Zone. The common theory is that could not have happened without the intervention of man. You do realize that there are several laboratories in the territory of the Zone?
I know, I even visited some of them.
Well, what are they? What experiments were carried out? It is unclear ... Military frequented some of them, and found documents.
Continue.
We need to find these documents. Or something that can shed some light on this whole situation.
Where can I find the documents? I'm more than sure the Military has removed them from the Zone.

You're right, of course. But, you must understand in order to reach the laboratory, it's necessary to know the Zone really well. Surely someone led the Military there. You know what I mean? They must have had a guide. He was either a Stalker or former Stalker who joined the Military.
How do I find him?

I'll help you. I know who the guide was, a Stalker named Varangian. I can even tell you where to find him, at the Agroprom. I can't be more precise than that, find him and try to talk to him. He's a serious guy, so be careful with him. Go, while I work out how to get you a 'pass' for the Peacekeeping Corps, so you can get past the Military checkpoint. Find Varangian, learn what he knows, then report back to me at once. By that time I will figure something out.
I love businessmen. Okay, all clear, I am going to Varangian.
Are you Varangian?
Well I am, what can I do for you?
I have a couple of questions for you, I was sent by Barkeep.
I have no desire to talk to you. All the more, to answer your questions, your Barkeep can drop dead. Piss off! Don't disturb me.
Varangian, regards!
Oh, hi Strelok, what brings you back here?
Listen, Varangian, this concerns you, Barkeep has sent me. Remember, when you were assigned to a Military lab? Well, we're looking for some documents.
Why do you and Barkeep want these documents?
Believe me Varangian, it is necessary, very necessary to find them.

Anyone else - would be shot, but you're the first who was able to win my ... Okay, listen: it was about a year ago, I was a Digger with a vengeance, and I came here and investigated the area inside and out. I was particularly interested in the various dungeons and laboratories. However, here I found a place where there were lots of artifacts, I grabbed them all. I hit the jack-pot, so to speak.
Please continue.

Oh and note, with regular trips back to the Cordon, I always took the direct path to Barkeep. I was in a good mood and I muttered under my breath about the artifacts in my backpack being fairly good, and out of nowhere, the Special Forces appear. I was overpowered and taken to the checkpoint. And there ... Major Yarofeev, the bastard! He threatened me - either I lead the Military group to the laboratory or get shot here and now, since officially in this area, everything and anything that moves, is subject to automatic destruction. Well, what to do? I agreed with this 'mother fucker'. So, I took his soldiers to the laboratory, and out of ten people, only half survived. He told me after all, I was just a piece of meat to them who knew the way. Also, we had seen a fancy Burer in Laboratory X-18. Anyway, they found the box of documents and we all went back to the Cordon. There I struck them down since I was more than sure I could shoot Yarofeev. Damn, why did I let him live as a witness?
Listen, those documents, do you know where they are now? Approximately anyway?
Come on! Like I have nothing else to do but read some documents. I wished to survive and for me this was the main thing. I think you should find Major Yarofeev, he is bound to know something.
Where can I find him?

Where, where, at the checkpoint, where else? Though he is cunning, he is always drunk, so most likely he will always remain at the checkpoint. He'll get plastered and sleep for two days, so wake the prick. In short, ask Barkeep as to Major Yarofeev's whereabouts.
Well, thanks Varangian, I will go to Barkeep in the Cordon, I think he will be able to tell me how to find Major Yarofeev.
Hello, Barkeep. I've seen Varangian - he's a serious man.
Well, did you learn anything?

Yes, I did find out something. There is a Major at the checkpoint named Yarofeev. He is precisely who we're looking for. He should be the key to getting the information we need. Do you know if he is at the checkpoint right now?

Yes, I know this louse. I have an idea, picture this: let's have a little war with the Military, it's time. You won't be alone, I have three brave men, and they are close to the checkpoint, just to the left, in the valley where the mine field is. I'll tell them to advance to the checkpoint. While they distract them, you try to get through, well, then - you can act on the situation. Go with God, Strelok. The guys will clear the road to the Peacekeeping Corps. After you extract the information from Yarofeev fill me in, tell me what and how, and then I'll give you a pass to the Peacekeeping Corps and a letter for Sidorovich. That's the plan.
Okay, I'll be back.
Well, Yarofeev, we need to talk.
Who the hell are you?
You better drink some water and then listen attentively, your response will determine whether you live or die.
Is there something I can do for you?
Remember Varangian? A year or so ago, he led a group of Military to the Laboratory X-18.
Wait... well yes it was, like... It was - I remember! But what do you want from me?
I need to know what was in those documents that were removed from the Laboratory.
But how could I know? That was a top secret operation, what can I tell you?
Well, if you do not know then I don't need you.

Wait ... wait, I really don't know what was in those documents, but I remember that one of our leaders, a Colonel I think, spilled the beans on the subject. We drank a lot, yes, I remember it now, and the booze loosened his tongue. He spoke about the fact that in this laboratory, experiments were conducted on prisoners, some of which impacted on the brain. To what extent, I really don't know. I also remember that the Colonel said that it would be necessary to go to X-16, another Laboratory. There must be some more important documents there. Just how do you get there? Two groups have already disappeared, and there is virtually no place for a helicopter to land. All the pilots say as soon as you start to fly into the territory of the laboratory the helicopter does not handle correctly. The place has some kind of devilry.
Is that all?
I swear, that's all, I know nothing more.
I need to deal with you ... Well, Okay - you can live, but if you're lying - don't blame me, you will be shot.
Regards, Barkeep.
Well, what happened with Yarofeev?

I learnt from Major Yarofeev that in Laboratory X-18, mind experiments were conducted on prisoners, and that there is another Laboratory called X-16. He indicated that there are some more important documents or other things still there. But to get there is not easy and there is some evil there too.

I've heard about this lab - indeed, it's a dangerous place. Well, I need to consult with someone, and decide what to do. In the meantime, you should go to the Peacekeeping Corps and find Sidorovich in the village in the northeast and give him this encrypted message from me. But at the same time you should also learn about Mahomet. Here, take this letter and the pass for the Peacekeepers - show it to the sentry at the gate, they should let you pass - they are not warriors, they first think, then shoot. But nevertheless, be careful with them. Tell them, that you work as a guide for the Military at the Cordon. About the pass, don't worry - it's, well, almost real, no one should challenge it.
It is clear, give me the letter and pass, and I'll move on.
Hey, Barkeep.
Well what's new?

I delivered your letter to Sidorovich. He in turn sends you a response. Here take it. I learned from him where I can find Mahomet. For this I need to see the scientists at Yantar. So, going to the Peacekeeping Corps has been very useful. However it was necessary to shoot and run a little, but I'm used to it. Okay, what's next?
Wait, now, lets see what Sidorovich says ... Well, well, an interesting proposal. Well, I will have to think...
What is the importance there?

Yes, I have very important things to plan. But, until you reveal some secrets I cannot. I'll have to think things through carefully and consult with someone before making a final decision. Now down to urgent matters about Laboratory X-16 about which Yarofeev spoke: you have to go into the lab at Yantar and find anything: documents, computer, laptop. In short, anything that will help us to understand what was happening there. All the more, as I understand it, this will help in finding your brother. To get to the X-16 lab will not be easy. They say that in the laboratory there is something that burns the brains of all living things. You need to ask the scientists at Yantar, maybe they can help get you into the laboratory. Talk with Sakharov. Yantar by road is through Rostok. Ask Earl how to get there, he has asked for you to do an important job for him anyway. I think you know where to find him, especially since it's on your way. While you are working on this issue I need to think about Sodorovich's proposal. Your help will be needed later. Remember to take what you find to Fang, he'll be waiting for you at a farmstead near the Freedom base at the Military Warehouses.
Understood, I'm going.
Hi, Professor.
Oh, Strelok, your here, I'm always glad to see you. How are you? Did you find your brother?
No, unfortunately I haven't. I'm here on a somewhat different matter. I need your help to get into lab X-16.
They say that there is a kind of Psi-working machine there which destroys the brain of any living creature. I don't know how to help you.
Professor look I have a helmet, maybe it is possible to do something with it?

Give me a look. It's well made. Your helmet should shield the radiation coming from the unit, but apparently all the protection from your helmet will not be enough. You know, I thought of this: if your helmet can be reconfigured then perhaps you will be able to pass into the lab.
Professor, can you do it?
But alas, I cannot.
But who can?

There is one person, that we had once worked with. Then something strange happened to him. He began to shout at night, then suddenly he would became silent and would just sit and stare at something all day, then he got even worse and he began to throw things at people. We ... I had to part with him. Apparently he experienced a wave of radiation from the laboratory. It was decided to eliminate him, so Dan and his guys went to the Radar to kill this crazy Professor. They spoke to Sviblov who said the crazy Professor had fled. So you need to find him. He once, a long ago, had been occupied with studying the effects of Psi emissions on the brain of humans and kept a journal. In this journal there are valuable notes. And if we procure this journal then I could retune your helmet.
Got it, I'll talk to Sviblov.
Sviblov, hello.
Hi Strelok, what has brought here?
Sakharov has sent me to you. I'm looking for the crazy Professor.

This loony escaped at night by using his teeth to gnaw through the rope and fled even though he hurt his neck in the process. He, like lightning, was fucking impossible to stop. As far as I am concerned he should have been shot a long time ago.
And where can I find him now?
Well, most likely in the laboratory. But why do you seek him? He is unpredictable. You need to tranquilize him or he will attack you. You need to procure a tranquilizer pistol.
So where can I get one?
Well, go to Kruglov, he will give you the tranquilizers and a special pistol for firing them.
Hello Kruglov, I have a request.
What kind of request?
They say you have a gun that shoots tranquilizers. I need to borrow it for a couple of days.
I can loan it, but not free, you understand.
Is there something I can do for you?
I have some valuable information about monsters for Duty, and I have no one to deliver it.
It's hard to walk away.
Take this. I'll give you a gun, and even a recipe for transmutations that is very rare. And another request - go through Rostok, there is a gang of thugs there that we need to deal with.
Okay, I'll go. I will deal with these scumbags.
Greetings, General!
Oh, Strelok, what's brought you here?
Here, Kruglov has sent this case.
At last, I was beginning to worry. Now we're going to know about the situation with the mutants and I hope it will help us. Oh well, go to Petrenko, he was looking for you for some reason.
Hello Colonel! You wanted to see me?
Yes, there is one little matter. According to rumours, Freedom has altered an RG-6 to use NATO M-209 rounds.
So, why am I needed?
Very simply, we need you procure one for us.
Well, Colonel, I'll try.
Halt!
Soldier, I'm here on business.
I was ordered to not allow anyone to pass.
What do you need to let me in?
I do not take bribes.
Ok, vodka maybe?
Fuck your vodka, we have it in bulk.
Maybe some weapons or med kits?
I have enough ... ah maybe ... something good to smoke. If you know what I mean! Can you get me some?
I think I can help you. Okay?
Okay, bring me some 'grass' and we'll talk.
Hello, Duke. I need something from you.
Greetings to you too! What do you need?
I need some 'grass', you know, not parsley.
Uh-uh brother, sorry but nope, that was sold. But maybe there will be some more in about a week.
C'mon Duke, surely you have a little bit for me?
Well there is little, but you can understand that it's not easy to come by.
What do you want for it?

Well Strelok it's my sidekick's birthday soon. I want to give him a decent weapon. An Abakan with an integrated grenade launcher. He had always wanted one. Now I remember, it's called an Assault Akaban!
Okay I will get this gun just for you, but don't sell the 'grass' to anyone.
Regards Duke, here, take it, I found the Assault Akaban.
Well done! Shit, I'm happy! The lad will be delighted. He's wanted one for so long. Well thank you!
Well, did you get the 'grass'?
Yes! Here's your grass. I put it in a box so it does not get wet. And here is a present from me, a modified SPAS-12. Take it, Duke doesn't lie!
Good.
Hello, I've got the 'grass', here take it.
Well done. I'll go away and pretend to see nothing. Come on, you have three minutes to take what you need.
Regards Colonel.
So, did you bring anything?
As promised I've brought you the modified RG-6.
Well done, and here is your reward - a formula for transmutations and more: personally from me, an AK-47 with a specially modified magazine.
Well, I fulfilled your request.
Thanks, you've saved us.
Okay, Kruglov, I'm in a hurry, give me what you promised and I will go, there are things I have to do.
Here is a special Colt and a clip with tranquilizers. Is this for the mad Professor?
I'll give him a new birthmark.

Well, here's a tip: when you see him, just shoot him, they say he's crazy. If you delay he will begin firing at you. This gun won't harm him but you will be able to get him under control and talk to him - he will calm down for a while. I think you'll have enough time to talk. And another thing: you can only do it once, otherwise he will be even more out of control and you won't be able to calm him - that's a feature of the sedative.
Professor... Professor, wake up!
I'm listening ... I'm listening, I hear them. Do you hear them?
Whom?
Voices, they... They are calling me.
No, I hear nothing.
Bu bu bu bu bu.
Professor, I need your journal.
Listen ... they ... they sing ... so beautifully...
Yes, yes, very nice, but listen, listen to me.
Journal?
Yes, yes, the voices requested that you give me your journal.
Voices ... hurt ... and ... beautiful.
They requested that you give me the journal and then all will be beautiful without pain.
It won't hurt, I do not want ... My head ... Very, very painful...
Trust me, everything will be fine, give me the journal, do you have it?
Well ... Okay, here. It hurts not to be ... they call ... I'll be happy ... bu bu bu bu bu.
God forbid this happening to me.
Well Professor, I finally found you.
You did get the journal?
Yes, here is it, take it.
So let's take a look ... yeah ... clear, get your helmet ... so ... in all, now I think it will protect you from the Psi-emission.
I hope so, God forbid, suffering the same fate as the Professor.
Well, Strelok, I hope you succeed. God bless you or whoever you believe in.
Well, we meet again.
Thanks to you those Mercenaries, those bastards, are screwed.
Yes, today I help you, tomorrow you help me.
You did bring the documents from laboratory X -16?
There were no documents, just a laptop computer.

Let's take a look. Yeah ... so ... You know what, it turns out that they conducted experiments on humans in Laboratory X 18, and then using data they obtained there, they put it to use in Lab X-16, and adjusted their Psi-installation.
Well, what do we do now?

We still don't know who is behind it all. But we've learnt that there is a group of people that have conducted terrible experiments on prisoners, and that there is some installation in lab X-16, by the way, I don't think that it is the only one, surely there are more. We should pay a visit to laboratory X-18.
Why? The Military have already been there and I doubt they left anything.
The laptop has relatively recent entries. There is even an entry a month back, you know what that means? Someone has been there not long ago.
Okay, I'll go, I'll see if I can find something interesting.
Hello, Fang.
Well, have you been inside the laboratory?
Yes! However it was strange that they were waiting for me.
Who?
The Monolith.

For some reason I think that they are somehow involved. Strelok, the situation is heating up! I have a feeling that the Monolith has something planned. Passing Diggers have said that they spotted a group of Monolith at the Radar, and then running into them in the lab ...There is something very serious brewing with these mercenaries. Well, Strelok, Ghost is waiting for you. We need to understand all this before it is too late.
Back to Pripyat? No, I'm not going.
But why?
I barely got out of there alive. No to Pripyat and Chernobyl combined! I'll pass!
Damn, I never expected that from you Strelok. Oh well! Can you do a small job for me? An easy one!
What do you need me to do?

It's not safe here. Take this flash drive and the laptop from lab X-16 to Barkeep. You need to lie low for a while. That's all I'm asking, go. Barkeep still has some work for you. In the meantime, I'll try to solve your issues. When you return, we will decide how to solve this puzzle.
Okay, Fang, I will give Barkeep the laptop computer and flash drive.
Regards Barkeep, I have some stuff for you from Fang.
What has he sent?
A flash drive and a laptop from Laboratory X-16.
Oh, mother of ... well ... all right then. Anything else?
Fang directed me to Lab X-18 for a PDA.
What is needed?
There is easy work, escort a tourist around 'Cordon'.
Well these tourists will go anywhere. What do they think, that this is a "Theme Park"?!

Come on the work is easy and it pays well. You don't have to go far. Take him to the bridge, well, maybe a little farther, and then bring him back. At first he said he wanted to go to the 'Garbage', but I immediately told him that is was too dangerous. He was happy with that.
Where is this tourist?
He waits for you in the village.
Okay, I will work this tour. Hopefully he's not a complete idiot.
Hello, are you looking for a guide?
Yes, I ... I want to see mutants like a Bloodsucker and a Chimera.
Bloodsucker, Chimera ... Hmm ... we'll have to look around. Well, let's go I suppose.
Yes I'm ready.
What's wrong?
Travelling is difficult. Let me catch my breath. Where are the bloodsuckers? I want see a live bloodsucker.
Well you're annoying, we'll go past the bridge. There I think you will see a bloodsucker.
Well, did you see what you came to see?
Not really, can we go to the 'Garbage'?
You can go by yourself. I won't take you there. It is too dangerous there, especially for you.
It's a pity, okay then let's go back to camp.
It is high time.
Well Sidorovich it's done.
I relied on you, you did not fail me.
Okay, pay me and let me go.
Here take this.
What else has happened?
The Doctor and his friends have a problem.
What's the problem?
The Monolith are hunting them, and the Mercenaries are after them too. In short, they need help.
Here we go again. I thought they could handle their own affairs.

It turns out that they need your help. Besides, this problem must be resolved. It won't go away because the Monolith has something really big planned. I am afraid that for all of us help might not come in time. So you need to go to Pripyat to find Feldsher and Ghost and seek someone's help.

Well it's time to hit the road. I need to go to Chernobyl NPP. I've discovered something about my brother. I must find someone to ... hell, how do I get to Pripyat? Through the Radar? That place is full of Mercenaries.
Talk with the Doctor he will help you. Oh, and Fang asked for you. He has something important for you.
Okay I'll go. I'll hit the road and find Fang. See you!
Hello Doctor.
It's good that you've come, Strelok.

Your friends are in danger. To help them, I have to go to Pripyat. The sooner I go the better things will be. I'm on my way to Chernobyl. I think I found a clue that might clarify what happened to my brother.

Yes, these are serious affairs now. I will show you how to get to Pripyat, but it is difficult. So you must help me first. For you it's a snap. While I find out where the path to Pripyat from the Swamps starts you can do something for me.
What you do need?
I feel somewhat under the weather and I need to cook up some medicine, so I need several ingredients.
What are they?
I need 3 poltergeist eyes, 3 burer hands, 3 cat tails and a Ruby Battery artifact.
No problem, it's a lay-up! I will go look for them.
Hi, Doctor.
Well did you find what I requested?
Yes here is everything that was on the list.
You've saved me, so thanks! Come here and I'll mark your PDA with the transition to Pripyat from the Swamps.
How do you do Feldsher? I haven't seen you for a while.
Yes destiny does not deceive.
What do you mean?
No matter how hard you try to run away from what you are destined to do, you just can't get away. You must fulfil your mission.
What mission, what are you talking about?

Strelok, you need to go to the Control Bunker again. Apparently in such a short time there is something that is going happen that is seriously bad for us all. You should find some time to prevent the threat. Specific information about what the mad scientists are plotting is in the bunker. So we will have to act accordingly.
Okay, but what are my chances?

I won't lie to you, you have little chance of doing this. But you're the only one who can cope with this task. Most likely you will face in the Bunker some new kind of psycho-therapy. According to the specificity of experiments that the scientists are conducting there. Therefore it is necessary for you to protect yourself from possible danger. There is a very strong drug called Adulin. This is a powerful biochemical tool for the long time protecting of the human psyche from a variety of Psy-effects and psychological attacks. The protection that this drug gives is much higher than that of a Psi-helmet.
So where do I get this drug?

Not far from here, in the heart of Pripyat, somewhere near Lenin Square, there is a cache, a backpack with Adulin injectors, in a special refrigerated container. Solomon told me about this Monolith cache. Bring me the backpack and I'll give you the injection, which will protect your mind from the effects of Psi, or any other interference to your mind while you're in the Bunker.
Well, I'll go look for this hidden backpack with Adulin.
Here, Feldsher, I found the backpack with the Adulin.
Good, give it here.
Here take it.
So what's next?
I'll give you an injection of Adulin.
I hope this doesn't hurt.
No Strelok it won't hurt, but after the injection you will be a little hazy, but this will soon pass.
Ah, I wish I didn't have to do this... I'm beginning to hate needles.

I understand, but such is fate. It's your destiny. Also since you're going away the Doctor prepared a gift for you, a one-time Teleporter. It can be very useful when you have no other choice. Just remember: when activated teleportation will occur from the point where the person is standing to the Doctor in the Swamps. Teleportation is possible only once for one person. But be careful the Mercenaries have raided Pripyat. I had to change locations. I moved here from the stadium. Surely they are hanging out somewhere near here. Look out for them! I think I said everything I wanted. Now prepare for the injection.
Take my arm, it's faster. And thanks for the teleporter, it certainly will come in handy. Well goodbye, just in case.
I have a choice?
No. We need you. Besides, you know too much.
And what are you going to do to me?
Do you have something for sale?
I have weapons, cartridges and med kits.
What kind of weapons?
What cartridges?
How much for a med kit?
I have a type MR-7a3 submachine gun for 40 blind dog tails, a smooth bore SPAS-12 shotgun for 30 pseudo-dog tails, and a Bison submachine gun for 25 Bloodsucker tentacles.
I have common AK cartridges - 3 packs for 6 Chimera claws, or buckshot - 3 packs for 6 Wild Boar hooves.
I have two med kits - for 6 Flesh Eyes.
Give me the MR-7a3, I like it.
Yes, Barkeep, greed can be good, but in moderation.
Where is the SPAS-12? My favourite weapon, I take it.
Bison - this is cool, I take it.
Cartridges for the AK? I'll take some, I have many Bloodsucker tentacles.
Buckshot? I need some, I'll take them.
At those prices! I might just as well shoot myself.
Well, give me some med kits, and then I can go back to the Zone. You can never have too many.
Is there something I can do for you?
I'm here to do some business.
What kind of business?
I exchange for parts of mutants, but not all of them.
Which ones?

For 10 Tushkano heads - 3 packs of NATO rounds, 
 For 10 Zombie hands - 3 packs of NATO armour piercing rounds, 
 For 5 Pseudogiant paws - 3 packs of cartridges for SVD sniper rifle 
 For 5 Controller hands - 5 Army med kits, plus five antirads..
Okay, I'll get some.
Hello, Mazai. I've brought something.

What do you have? remember, we agreed on a fixed fee: 
 For 10 Tushkano heads - 3 packs of NATO rounds, 
 For 10 Zombie hands - 3 packs of NATO armour piercing rounds, 
 For 5 Pseudogiant paws - 3 packs of cartridges for SVD sniper rifle 
 For 5 Controller hands - 5 Army med kits, plus five antirads.
I have 10 Tushkano heads.
I have 10 Zombie hands.
I have 5 Pseudogiant paws.
I have 5 Controller hands.
Forgive me, I was mistaken.
What's on sale here?
Weapon, cartridges and Army med kits.
What weapons?
What cartridges?
How much for the Army med kits?

This is what I've got: 1) SIG SG552 Commando for a Cobblestone artefact. 2) SIG SG551 for a Tears of Fire artefact. 3) M16A1 rifle for a Simbion artefact. 4) Colt M4A1 for a Ruby Spring artefact. 5) FA MAS prototype 3 for a Gold Slice artefact. 6) SIG 550 sniper rifle for a Soul Drops artefact.
I'll take the SIG SG552 Commando.
I'll take the SIG SG551.
I'll take the M16A1 rifle.
I'll take the Colt M4A1.
I'll take the FA MAS prototype 3.
I'll take the SIG 550 sniper rifle.
Not at those prices, well, I'll just stick with my AK.

This is what I have: 1) "5.56x45mm AP" - three packs for two Droplets artifacts, 2) "5.56x45mm SS109" - three packs for two Blood Stone artifacts, 3) "F-1 Grenade" - three pieces for two Bengal Fire artifacts.
Give me the armour-piercing cartridges.
Give me the common cartridges.
Give me the grenades.
Army med kits, 2 pieces - for 3 Slime artifacts.
Give me the Army med kits.
Is there something I can do for you?
Dude! I have some work, do you want to earn something?
What kind of work?

In short, man, listen here ... Ick ... My sidekick, Jack, as always, shit, he went on a trip. You know, dragging all sorts of odds and ends to the 'Mainland'. He was high man, you know from smoking joints, and took time off even though he was not sick, damn him. He didn't tell us. And now jack has literally screwed us ... Ick ... Without him we cannot go to the 'Mainland' and come back. There is a lot of danger there. The entire perimeter is guarded by helicopters. Fuck, complete asshole, tries ... Ick...
Are you drunk? God, you look disgusting! How does Duke tolerate such freaks? Well ... well, how I can to help you?

Do not worry, I'm ok! Duke said that you are a good guy, not like most of those shitty Stalkers. They just sit around the campfire telling tales and gorge themselves with Vodka, they are too afraid to help you. Help me out, brother, it is necessary to bring Jack back, he is now near the border of the Zone, he's hiding around the checkpoint. Or maybe he has already been seized by the Military ... Find my sidekick, bring him to the checkpoint, then I will thank you properly ... Be like Spock - save the shmuck! ... Ick ... Well, while I'll still drink, I don't want to break the habit, ha ha.
Gladly, I will try.
Hello, are you Jack?
Well, I, and who are you, my mother? You got any "cones"? Vodka?
No "cones". Vodka yes, but not for you. Cross sent me to cover your backside.
Shut up, it's already covered. It's very dangerous here, not only are there "gun -ships", but Special Forces as well. They are like an elephants in a china shop. In short, we're dead meat, pal.
Watch your language. I've come to help out, but if you don't need me, I'll go.
Well so what asshole. But thanks anyway for your offer. Look, I've been under a lot of stress. For two days I've been on edge, hungry and tired, trying to soothe my nerves. So calm down brother.
Okay, let's finish this argument and get out of here quietly.
All's good.
Ahh, Strelok, you mother fucker! Well, like, hello and all that ... Well, did you find Jack?
Well fuck Cross! The man does not like me. I brought Jack to the checkpoint, and then I don't know where he went or what happened to him. He's crass, just like you.
What, not again! Well done, brother! Duke was not mistaken, you really know your business. Well, as I promised, here take this as a sort of a present for your help!
Hello Lefty.
Well you seem healthy. Long time no see.
I had to see you. I have an anomaly detector, an unusual one. I found it on a Monolith, look, can it be repaired?

Come on; let's take a look at it. Oooh, this is a very good detector, if it's set correctly, then it will map practically all anomalies. So... so, in principle, it can be done, but it must be reconfigured with artifacts from anomalies that we want to show. To do this we need 6 artifacts, 1) Mica, 2) Crystal, 3) Goldfish, 4) Soul, 5) Ruby Spring and 6) Flash.
Damn! Where am I going to find all these artifacts? Well, ok, I will go look for them.
Hello Lefty.
Hey, brother! Did you find the artifacts?
Got everything. Here, take them.
Okay, wait a bit, now a little bit more ... so ... that's it, it is as good as new. You should now recognize anomalies, well almost all, at least the most dangerous ones, that's for sure.
Hello Fanatic! Jeez, you don't look so good?
Ahhhhh, my head hurts! Do you have anything for it? Three bottles of vodka will do nicely.
Well, I do have 3 bottles of vodka.
I can't wait, please give one to me now.
Sure, here take it.
So how are you feeling now?
A little better. Can I have another one?
Sure, here's another.
I'll give you a transmutation recipe, it's very valuable.
What's the recipe for?
Well, it's time for another one. Please join me.
I never turn down vodka. Sure, here. Well what's the recipe for?
A recipe to transmutate a Stone Porcupine. The artifact is rare, I can tell you! I have one of these ... ah...
What do you want for it?
You know I've recently had health problems. My liver has gone to hell. Knowledgeable people say that two Golden Slice artifacts would cure me and I don't have any.
Well brother if I find some I'll bring them to you, just don't forget about the recipe. And stop boozing, it will be end of you!
Hi, I'm here to save you.
What do you mean?
Well old man have you forgotten already, about the formula that is?
E-my, my memory has become full of holes. Well did you get the artifacts?
Yes, here take them.
Well you've saved me, thank you! I will be cured now! I will put the recipe for the transmutation on your PDA.
Hey, bro!
Hello again. Got anything for me to do?
I have some work, it's not hard either.
What kind of work?
Briefly, there's this person, his name is Noodles, he used to be my sidekick, but the bastard betrayed me. Hell if I know where he is. I would like to get my hands on that young reptile.
What do you expect me to do?

Just find this louse and you can decide what to do with him. For doing that I will give a recipe for transmutations, Giants Little Brother. In any case I was told recently by someone that he saw this four-eyed dog Noodles in the Garbage near the transition to the Dark Valley. Try to look for him there. Just hurry up otherwise he may disappear.
Okay, I will try to find Noodles.
What have you done Noodles?
What do you mean?
Haven't you guessed? I assume you know that you are being sought after.
Who? For what?
Well, it's better for you to explain your situation.

Well ... I was out with this guy, with who I was somewhat friendly, searching for artifacts but we found nothing. On our way back he found the corpse of a stalker. Well you know, we searched the body and found a recipe for transmutation and several good artifacts. It was getting dark so we camped for the night. My partner was on guard duty and I was asleep by the campfire. I woke up with someone strangling me. What a bitch! I couldn't make any noise, you know, because monsters were around. I had a large hunting knife, well, I somehow reached out and stabbed him to death. Now his pals will probably try to avenge his death.
Are you sure they will persecute you?
Believe me they sure will! Listen brother, what did the bandit promise you for your help?
Formula of transmutations, Giants Little Brother.

I wonder how that bastard learned about it. Well yes, agreed. I'll give you the formula for transmutations for Giants Little Brother, and on top of that one more little thing, a rare Ruger revolver. This gun is very rare and valuable and very powerful too. Finding cartridges for it will be difficult, so I'll give you one spare mag of cartridges. You can get more cartridges from Antiques. He deals in rare weapon ammo. I got this Ruger from him ... expensively! Moreover these cartridges I'll give you are the common type. Antiques should have the armour-piercing type. Go to the Bar to seek him out. He goes there often. Ask Borov he will knows where to find Antiques.
Fuck you!
Okay, you've persuaded me. Give me the recipe and the Ruger. I'll find Antiques. I love rare things.
Well? What happened?
Yeah yeah, your Noodles, I put him down.
You said you would, you did well, I respect you for that.
So where's the recipe?
Give me your PDA, I'll download the recipe, joking with you is dangerous, pal!
Borov, have you any work?
Strelok, there is this matter, my courier Claw was to arrive here with important information.
Well, and?
That's the problem! It's been two days and he has not shown up.
Well have you heard anything at all?

Nope, nothing really. The only clue is the fact that the last message he sent was from the Dark Valley. Perhaps it was Bandits or Marauders that got involved, they often hang around there. You know what, go down to Voronin, he polices the Dark Valley, maybe he knows something. Only one thing don't tell him who sent you. You understand I have some ideological differences with Duty. If you find the cache be careful it might be rigged to explode.
Okay, I will carefully try to find out what is going on.
Greetings General.
Hello Strelok what has brought you here?
I was sent by someone who said that his courier has vanished, somewhere in the Dark Valley.

About this courier I know nothing, nor do we control the entire Valley. At the factory all hell is breaking loose and we don't know what's going on. Although recently a gang of Bandits has arrived. I sent some guys to check it out and have not heard from them since. You go and find out what happened.
Regards, are you the one Borov is looking for?
Yeah I am. Thank you brother.
What happened then?
I was captured looking for a shorter route to the Bar from the Radar, by going through the Dark Valley. Damn it ... I've sat here for a couple two days now.
Why didn't they kill you?
I told them that Borov would pay a ransom for me. I knew he wouldn't pay, but I was stalling for time.
Okay let's get down to business, the information that you carried for Borov, where is it?
They took everything so I don't have it.
Shit where am I going to find it?
Don't worry, I overheard a small conversation between the Bandits, they intended to kill me anyway. They have a cache somewhere in Lab X-18. In the laboratory and somewhere high over a work bench.
Well, thank you for this. I'll go look for the PDA.
Well Borov the trip was waste of time. The PDA is gone, the cache was blown to hell. Boobytrapped! I almost lost my walnuts.

Now you have to go back to Pripyat to Ghost. He's got the information that was carried by the courier, and I've already paid him in advance. Just ask Ghost if he would give you a copy of the information, of course, thats if he has a copy.
But there is one thing!
What's with the 'but'?
There is no path to Pripyat. How do I get there?
Oh hell ... you know what Strelok, there is a way out.
How?
Rumour has it that Freedom wanted to go to Pripyat through the Radar. And they say that they have just found the passage to Pripyat. So, why don't you talk to Lukash?
Okay, I'll try to talk to Lukash.
Greetings!
Hello Strelok, haven't seen you for a while.
Yes, it's been a while. Listen up, I am on business.
What's up?
I've heard that you've found a path to Pripyat, right?
Who told you?
Come on, does it matter, I desperately need to Pripyat.
Well there is such a path, your information, though not 100% correct is fairly accurate. While we were at the Radar we accidentally discovered it.
Well, will you help me?
Look, get this: 'Quid Pro Quo'.
Man I hate lawyer talk. What do you need?

At the Radar, in the forest, a helicopter has recently crashed. The scientists had something in a metal container. I sent some guys there, but they found nothing. Find me the container and I'll help you.
Roger, you need the metal container which should be near the crashed helicopter. No problem.
Oh, I forgot to warn you that the container is radioactive, so do not forget to get more antirads, and if you have any artifacts that absorb radiation then hang them on your belt.
Hello!
Well did you find the container?
Ahuh, here is it, take it quickly, I'm already in pain from its radiation.
Well done! My guys just want to drink Vodka, tell stories and sit around the campfire. They are idiots!
Okay, Lucash what about my request?
Ah yes, you helped me. Give me your PDA and I will mark the way to Pripyat.
Regards, we meet again.
Hello Strelok, come in. How's things?
Good and bad. Did you send Borov some information via a courier?

Well I did, why? You're probably wondering why I got in touch with the Marauders? Borov's a rare bastard, but he pays well. I desperately need the money so I got involved in a scam with Fang. We extracted the required information and sent it to Borov by a courier.
I see. But here is the thing, there was a problem, Marauders captured the courier. He's alive, but the PDA was destroyed.
Damn! The information was the sole copy ... although, wait, I think I remember that Fang made a copy. I wonder, does he still have it?
Are you assuming that Fang has a copy?
Yes, most likely, he is a meticulous guy, loves to have insurance. So, now you must help Fang.
Well, there's one thing left to do, go to Fang. Well goodbye see you later.
Hello tooth fairy, er, I mean Fang.
Hi Strelok. I see you have a good sense of humor.
Well I hope you could possibly help me out.
I'll try, but what do you need?
Listen this could take a long time to explain, but the PDA which Ghost gave the courier to deliver has been lost. Ghost said that perhaps you may have a copy of the data.
Well you're lucky! Yes I do have a copy.
Thank God, so where is it?

The PDA is close, it's in the bloodsuckers village. There is a house with a cellar. The entrance to the cellar is covered by an oil barrel. It stops the beasts from accidently falling through, but it doesn't stop people. However some of the errie sounds do. lol There is a problem though.
What is the problem?
Recently in this house an anomaly has formed, or something like that, so I cannot get near the cache. It throws me back.
Well all sorts of wonders exist. Hopefully I'll sort it out.
Hey!
Hello, let's sit by the fire and chat.
I wanted to ask you, do you know what kind anomaly is in that house. I try going in, but it pushes me back.
Are there unpleasant sounds? Come back at night and I will explain everything.
But why at night?
Just come, I will explain it all and bring me some sweets. I love candies.
What kind of candy?
Have you any chocolate? No, then bring a tin of 'Montpensier'.
Well, I've brought a tin of 'Montpensier' candy for you.
Well, thank you!
Come on, tell me now.

This is what I can tell you, recently a family of poltergeists settled in the village. At night time they come out, so to speak, and during the day they sleep inside the house. I don't know how they do it, but during the day they protect themselves with a force field, so you can't enter. Well, now do understand why you can only enter at night?
I see. During the day, while they are in the house, I can't get in?
That's right, unless you kill them all, you cannot get inside the house in the daytime.
Yeah, well, about the job you assigned. Poltergeists gave me a run around while searching for the PDA, here's a present for you!
Did you find it?
Yes I found it, here take it.
This is very valuable information, well done! Here take this you deserve it.
